title: Engagement Designer - Games
description:
We are looking for a talented and skilled Engagement Designer to join one of our game teams here at Embark.
  
We are looking for a person who can add their knowledge, skills and experience within Meta Game, Progression, Engagement and Retention design, to a team of around 100 game makers that are in the production phase of development of a Free-to-play PvP Action Game.
  
As an Engagement Designer you will be responsible for designing, implementing, balancing and maintaining meta game features, including various types of player progression and player competition, that add to the player experience, and give players meaningful goals and activities to strive for over time.
  
You will be working closely together with the monetization team, as well as Game Production and Product Direction, in analyzing the performance of meta game features, to ensure that we are able to engage and retain consistently and over a long time, as part of the game’s Live Service ambitions.
  
You will also work closely together with Creative and Gameplay Direction. And you will be working cross collaboratively with Core Gameplay Designers as well as UI and UX Developers, to ensure that engagement features are presented as an attractive package that fits well with the rest of the game.
  
  

Example of responsibilities
  
Design and collaborate on metagame and progression systems and features for long term player retention and engagement
  
Articulating, pitching and presenting engagement features and systems for the project to adopt and develop
  
Monitor trends on engagement systems in order to identify best practices, achieve optimal results and innovation
  
Be a stakeholder in the frontend, to make sure that retention and engagement features are part of a cohesive experience design
  
Analyze the impact of changes in the game and identify opportunities that will have a positive impact on engagement in development and as part of the Live Service
  
Track the performance of engagement and retention features, and suggest alterations and improvements in live context, to achieve healthy performance indicators
  
Continuously balance and optimize retention and engagement features for achieving the best player enjoyment and engagement.
  
  

It would be awesome if you
  
3+ years or more experience in similar roles
  
Has shipped games AA, AAA, F2P
  
Has experience with balancing in-game economies (XP, Reward Frequency, etc.)
  
Experience using analytics and telemetry to make design decisions, and to advice project leadership, when needed
  
Experience working on live service game
  
Great cross collaboration skills
  
Ability to articulate and champion features and initiatives in a diverse group of developers
  
Fluency in English
  
  

At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "Open Application."

title: Marketing Director
description:
**This is more than a job —** It’s a chance to create something extraordinary. **If you’re passionate about driving growth, shaping a beloved brand, and making a real difference in the world of veterinary care,** we want to hear from you !

**About AniCura:**


AniCura is a family of well-known animal hospitals and clinics specializing in veterinary care for companion animals. AniCura provides modern, high-quality veterinary care for pets at circa 500 practices in 17 European countries and creates peace of mind for pet owners through excellent access and patient safety. AniCura has a turnover of around $1B with the aspiration to expand business through a combination of organic growth and new hospital acquisitions. Every year, AniCura’s 12,000 passionate veterinary professionals attend to four million companion animal patients. Since 2018, AniCura has been a part of Mars Veterinary Health, a family-owned company focused on veterinary care.

**Job purpose:**


Are you a dynamic marketing leader who thrives on making an impact? Do you have the vision and expertise to position AniCura as the go-to provider of veterinary care across Europe? We are searching for a **Marketing Director** who will be the driving force behind AniCura’s brand growth, leveraging **data, technology, and creativity** to **engage pet owners, enhance customer experience, and strengthen our market position.**


As a **key strategic partner to the President and Leadership Team**, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AniCura’s marketing, ensuring we continue to evolve and lead in a competitive landscape.


Your mission? To build **a strong, trusted, and recognizable brand**, create **seamless customer journeys**, and foster **long-term relationships with pet owners and veterinary professionals.**

**Summary:**



* **Job Title**: Marketing Director


* **Department**: Marketing


* **Reports To:** AniCura President
* **Location:** The Netherlands or Sweden


* **Languages:** Proficiency in English and any other European language is a plus.


* **Other key relationships:** Member of AniCura Leadership Team.


* **Direct reports:** 2 direct reports AniCura Marketing team, plus dotted line Market Marketing Heads.
**Roles & Responsibilities:**

* **Growth Strategy:** Develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy aligned with AniCura’s business objectives. Identify new market opportunities, analyze customer insights, and leverage competitive intelligence to drive brand positioning and business expansion. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate branding, customer segmentation, campaigns, product offerings, and customer experience initiatives.
* **Research & Insights:** Optimize and leverage CRM systems to enhance customer engagement and retention. Use advanced analytics to improve targeting, segmentation, and loyalty programs, ensuring customer-centric strategies that drive growth and long-term value.
* **Funnel Optimization & Customer Journey Mapping:** Oversee the entire customer journey, from awareness to loyalty, ensuring a seamless experience across digital and physical touchpoints. Enhance brand visibility, refine the consideration phase, and drive conversion by improving online interactions, appointment booking processes, and in-clinic experiences.
* **Digital & Performance Marketing:** Lead a cutting-edge digital marketing strategy across SEO, SEM, social media, email, and other digital channels. Oversee UX and brand design to ensure a unified and engaging customer experience. Leverage data-driven insights to enhance personalization, optimize media spend, and improve conversion rates. Stay ahead of digital trends to maintain AniCura’s competitive edge.
* **Brand Development & Thought Leadership:** Strengthen AniCura’s brand identity and market presence. Develop compelling storytelling, content marketing, and PR strategies that reinforce AniCura’s reputation as a trusted provider of veterinary care. Ensure consistency in messaging and brand voice across all markets.
* **Leadership & Culture:** Build and develop a high-performing marketing team, fostering a collaborative, innovative, and customer-centric culture. Lead, mentor, and support team members, driving performance excellence and professional growth. Manage external partnerships with agencies and vendors to enhance marketing capabilities.
* **Stakeholder Collaboration & Cross-Functional Alignment:** Work closely with internal stakeholders, including operations, finance, and clinical teams, to align marketing efforts with business goals. Foster strong relationships within the AniCura network and across the broader Mars Veterinary Health ecosystem.

**Education and professional qualifications:**

* University degree or the equivalent combination of education, training and experience that provides the required knowledge, skills, and abilities.

**Key Competencies:**

* **Strategic Vision:** Ability to align marketing strategies with organizational goals and anticipate market trends.
* **Relationship Building:** High emotional intelligence to inspire trust and collaboration among stakeholders.
* **Matrix Organization Collaboration:** Experienced in navigating complex matrix structures, effectively coordinating across functions and geographies to drive alignment and achieve shared goals.
* **Execution Excellence:** Strong focus on achieving results, taking calculated risks, and adapting to ambiguity.
* **Leadership:** Skilled at motivating teams, managing performance, and building a culture of continuous improvement.

**What We’re Looking for:**

* 15+ years of experience in Marketing, including 5+ years in a Senior Leadership role (Board/Leadership Team level preferred).
* Proven expertise in brand development, digital marketing, customer experience, and analytics-driven decision-making.
* Strong leadership skills – ability to build and develop teams in a matrix organization
* Excellent strategic thinking and execution abilities with a focus on growth, performance, and innovation.
* Experience managing budgets and media spend optimization.
* Outstanding communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Fluent in English (additional European languages a plus)
* Employment Visa: Preference for Candidates with a Valid Work Permit

**Our offer:**

* Join a purpose driven company, where we’re striving to shape the future of veterinary care, together.
* An industry competitive salary and benefits package
* A stimulating work environment with good opportunities for personal development
* Freedom to take responsibility and the opportunity to influence
* Flexible working hours, hybrid working, international, digital work environment
* Learning and development opportunities
* The opportunity to cuddle our beloved 4-legged friends in our offices.
* We are always open for a conversation to discuss your individual needs.

**If this sounds like you**


Please contact **Lekya Kanamarlapudi, Group Corporate Recruiter**, who is happy to tell you more about this opportunity and the recruitment process. Or apply by submitting your resume through clicking the apply button below.

**AniCura is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from candidates with diverse backgrounds.**

title: Strategic Senior UX Researcher
description:
**Oneflow is a rapidly growing tech scale-up located in the heart of Stockholm. We have created a platform that automates the entire contract process from start to finish, all in one place. Turning clunky, static contracts into customer-oriented, digital contracts that feel like magic.**

**About the role:**


We’re looking for a Strategic Senior UXR to connect user-centered research with strategic decision-making at Oneflow while empowering the organisation and product teams to further embed data-driven and user-centered approaches into their processes. You’ll play a critical role in uncovering actionable insights that influence both how we improve our product (tactically) and where we should focus for future growth (strategically). You’ll collaborate closely with UX Designers, Product Managers, Analytics, and the Strategy team to provide actionable insights that inform and support the product vision and strategy, ensuring alignment with user needs, market trends, and business goals.  

  

This is a high-impact role for someone who thrives on connecting research to strategy and is eager to shape the future direction of our products while ensuring we’re solving the right problems for our users.  

  

**What You’ll Do**


1. Tactical Research: Building the Product Right  

* Lead qualitative and quantitative research activities, including user interviews, usability testing, surveys, and data analysis.
* Collaborate with our Product Trio’s to prioritise problems to solve, validate solutions through iterative testing, and connect user insights with market opportunities.
* Mentor core team members in research best practices, empowering and supporting UX Designers and PMs by fostering a research-driven culture across the organisation.

2. Strategic Research: Building the Right Product  

* Collaborate with the Strategy and Analytics teams to conduct market research, analyse quantitative data, and uncover trends and growth opportunities.
* Integrate user research with market and quantitative insights to create a shared understanding of customer needs, business opportunities, and the competitive landscape.
* Explore and validate strategic opportunities by combining customer insights with market dynamics and data-driven findings.
  

3. Cross-Functional Collaboration and Influence  

* Act as a bridge between UX, PMs, Engineering, Analytics and Strategy teams, ensuring a unified approach to gathering and leveraging insights.
* Present research findings and strategic recommendations to leadership and cross-functional teams, driving alignment around customer-centric priorities.
* Facilitate for user-centered decision-making across the organisation, linking research insights to measurable business outcomes.
**Who You Are**  

  

* An Expert Researcher: You have deep expertise in user research methods (qualitative and quantitative) and are adept at uncovering actionable insights that inform both tactical decisions and strategic direction.
* A Strategic Thinker: You understand the broader context of product and business strategy, including market research, growth opportunities, and competitive dynamics.
* A Collaborative Partner: You thrive in cross-functional environments, working closely with PMs, UX, Engineering, Analytics and Strategy teams to align insights with goals and drive shared success.
* An Engaging Communicator and Storyteller: You excel at articulating complex findings clearly and effectively, using compelling narratives to inspire action and ensure research insights resonate across diverse audiences.
* A Mentor and Advocate: You enjoy mentoring others in research methodologies, championing user-centric thinking, and fostering collaboration across teams.

  

**We Believe You Have**  

  

* 5+ years of experience in user research, product insights, or a related role, preferably in B2B SaaS environments.
* Expertise in a range of research methods, including interviews, usability testing, surveys, and competitive analysis.
* Familiarity with market research and analytics tools, and an understanding of how to combine qualitative and quantitative data.
* A proven track record of influencing product and business strategies through research.
* Excellent communication and facilitation skills, with experience presenting to senior leadership.

  

**The Impact You’ll Make**  

  

* Deliver research that drives measurable improvements in the product and aligns with user and business needs.
* Foster a culture of curiosity and continuous learning by mentoring team members in research methodologies.
* Contribute to defining and refining Oneflow’s research practices, ensuring we deliver exceptional user experiences while meeting strategic objectives.
* Contribute to shape Oneflow’s product strategy by combining user insights, market trends, and growth opportunities.
* Bridge the gap between tactical UX research and strategic decision-making, creating a more research-driven organisation.
**Work location**  

  

This position is based at our Stockholm office. Remote arrangements are not available for this role.

 **Come work with us**


We value gender equality and diversity in organisation, so we strive for a team that reflects the diversity in today's society. At Oneflow we currently have 34 nationalities and are proud of an extremely diverse workplace. Our recruitment is based on competence.  

  

The recruitment process starts with an interview with Aleksandra from the Talent Acquisition team. Next, you will complete a personality and logic test, followed by an assignment, and then participate in the case interview.  

  

**We can’t wait to meet you!**  

Visit our website for more information about our product and Oneflow. Visit our career page for more information about our culture and future colleagues.

title: Head of Design
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*




**Om tjänsten**
 Vi söker nu en Head of Design till Fortnox affärsområde Financial Services. Här arbetar vi för att stärka våra kunder och förbättra deras likviditet genom innovativa finansiella tjänster, som bank- och betalningslösningar samt fakturatjänster.
 



 I rollen som Head of Design kommer du att vara en nyckelperson med helhetsansvar för designarbetet inom affärsområdet. Du driver utvecklingen och implementeringen av en designstrategi som stärker vårt varumärke, våra affärsmål och våra kunders upplevelse. Med fokus på både det visuella och det användarupplevelsebaserade (UX/UI) samt det skriftliga innehållet i våra produkter, säkerställer du att Fortnox levererar design av högsta kvalitet.
 



 Du kommer att spela en avgörande roll i vår Product Operating Model, där du arbetar nära utvecklings- och produktteam för att säkerställa att kundens perspektiv är en naturlig del av hela utvecklingsprocessen. Din förmåga att lyfta blicken och balansera kortsiktiga leveranser med långsiktiga strategiska mål är avgörande för att skapa verkligt värde.
 



 I rollen stöttar du teamen genom ett agilt arbetssätt, samtidigt som du säkerställer att designbeslut är i linje med våra affärsmål och kundbehov. Tillsammans med utvecklings- och produktledning bygger du ett starkt designsystem som bidrar till att befästa Fortnox som en ledande aktör inom finansiella tjänster.
 



**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter** 



* Säkerställa att designbeslut är i linje med Fortnox affärsmål och kundbehov.
* Implementera och driva en användarcentrerad designprocess baserad på kundinsikter och data.
* Leda och utveckla teamens arbete med både användargränssnitt och det skriftliga innehållet i våra produkter.
* Säkerställa att design och språk följer vårt varumärkes tonalitet och förhöjer kundupplevelsen.
* Främja innovation och kontinuerlig utveckling inom designområdet.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om trender och ny teknologi för att säkerställa att våra lösningar är konkurrenskraftiga.



**Vi söker dig som** 



* Har flera års erfarenhet av designarbete och behärskar hela designprocessen.
* Har gedigen ledarerfarenhet, gärna inklusive att leda andra chefer.
* Kan översätta användarnas behov till designlösningar som är i linje med affärsstrategin.
* Har erfarenhet av agil produktutveckling och ett datadrivet arbetssätt.
* Besitter en djup förståelse för designprinciper och kan arbeta strukturerat med etablerade metoder och verktyg.
* Är kommunikativ och bekväm med att presentera dina idéer och resultat för kollegor och intressenter.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande, både i tal och skrift.



 Vi ser gärna att du trivs i en miljö präglad av förändring och tillväxt. Du är prestigelös, pragmatisk och tydlig i ditt ledarskap, med en förmåga att skapa engagemang och vägleda teamen mot gemensamma mål.
 



**Vi erbjuder** 




 Som Head of Design på Fortnox rapporterar du till Business Area Director och ingår i affärsområdets ledningsgrupp. Du kommer leda en designorganisation och arbeta nära vår utvecklingsorganisation- och produktorganisation där ni tillsammans gör skillnad för Sveriges företagare. Du kommer att arbeta i skärpunkten mellan det beprövade, stabila och det nya, spännande med stor möjlighet att påverka hur vi designar våra produkter framåt.
 



 Vi värdesätter flexibilitet och möjligheten att arbeta på distans, samtidigt som vi strävar efter att skapa en inspirerande och kreativ arbetsmiljö för våra medarbetare. Rollen kräver regelbunden närvaro på olika orter där Fortnox har verksamhet, för närvarande Växjö (HQ), Stockholm, Malmö, vilket innebär att din arbetsdag kommer att vara en kombination av digitalt och fysiskt arbete.
   





**Om Fortnox**
*Fortnox AB (publ) är en företagsplattform som knyter samman människor, företag och organisationer. Vi hjälper företag starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska produkter, lösningar och tjänster, och möjlighet att koppla ihop dem med hundratals externa parter, är vi ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vår vision är att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag. Fortnox grundades 2001 och har huvudkontor i Växjö samt kontor i Malmö, Linköping och Stockholm. Aktien är noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm. För ytterligare information se* 
*www.fortnox.se* 
*.* 




**Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 21 februari!**

title: Product Designer
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a UX Designer to join our Design team. The primary focus of this role is to ensure that our users enjoy a seamless, intuitive, and enjoyable gaming experience on our platform.
   

  

 You will work closely with your manager and other UX designers to support the rest of the organization and enhance our user interface designs.
   

  

 If you are passionate about creating user-centered designs, making data driven decisions, implementing innovative features, and leading improvements for intuitive, and user-friendly solutions, then this is the role for you!
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Be responsible for driving the discovery design process of our platform
* Ensure we focus on the right things to build a better user experience
* Focus on the native app for LeoVegas in multiple markets
* Improve and maintain the applications with a multi-market product focus
* Be the backbone of our user engagement strategy


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE:
   

  

 Essential skills:
   

  

* A minimum of 3 years of experience as a UX designer driving projects
* Well versed in the discovery phase of the Triple Diamond design process
* Knowledge of quantitative and qualitative data sources and knows when to use them
* Ability to provide findings with viable solution recommendations in an easily digestible way
* Knowledge of UX best practices with a mobile-first and responsive design approach


 Nice to have skills:
   

  

* Graphic Design Experience
* Proven experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, and site maps
* Demonstrable experience with user interface design & ideation mapping tools like Figma, Sketch or AdobeXD
* Experience in working with software engineers
* Experienced with mobile apps


 WHO ARE WE?
   

  

 At the core of LeoVegas Group, is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices world-wide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Competitive basic salary
* Life-Occupational injuries & sickness insurance
* Possibility to enroll in an attractive private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution p/a
* 30 annual vacation days
* 1,500 SEK tech allowance
* Occupational Pension - Details on request
* Benify - A benefits portal with lots of attractive discounts
* Parental Pay
* Workation 4 weeks per year!
* Plenty of great company events
* Mobile phone & laptop of your choice
* If you are not based in the job location we will also provide you with a relocation package including flights and accommodation support
* Flexible hybrid working model


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Do you think you would be a good fit for the Leo pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English we’d like to see your CV in English please\*\*

title: Senior Product Designer
description:
**We are Forefront Ignite** 
 : a team of innovators passionate about turning ideas into reality. We work at the intersection of design, technology, and business to create exceptional user experiences that deliver real value. If you thrive on solving meaningful problems, we want to hear from you.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 




  




* **Turn ideas into rocket fuel -** 
 you think big, sketch instantly, prototype on the fly, and continually refine.
* **Drive insights with our clients** 
 - you’re right there in the trenches, ensuring the vision is both user-centric and commercially relevant.
* **Strip away the fluff** 
 - sharpen vague ideas into clear, actionable, and scalable outcomes.
* **Experiment, iterate, and innovate** 
 - help clients learn from what works (and what doesn’t) to consistently push the boundaries of design.
* **Master the trifecta of tech, people, and business** 
 - you are a swiss-army knife, able to effectively grasp technical requirements, user needs & business strategy.



  





**Who you are** 




  




* **A versatile designer** 
 - skilled in everything from user research and wireframing to prototyping and final design delivery.
* **A chameleon of industries** 
 - you've worked across different industries, adjusting your approach regardless of customer scale.
* **Confident and communicative** 
 - you excel at presenting ideas and spurring others to think outside the box.
* **Tech-savvy and business-minded** 
 - you bridge design with strategy effortlessly, and conversing about UX with a CTO, or ROI with a CFO doesn’t faze you.
* **Organized chaos agent** 
 - you understand when to follow established processes, and when to blow them up.



  





**Why join us?** 




  




* **Freedom to fail forward** 
 - push boundaries and keep the spark of innovation alive in everything you do.
* **Projects that stand out** 
 - we partner with forward-thinking startups and larger organizations ready for meaningful change.
* **Chart new directions** 
 - we encourage fresh perspectives and novel solutions.
* **Constant growth** 
 - from cutting-edge technologies to fresh methodologies, there’s always something new to learn.
* **Real impact** 
 - our projects don’t gather dust on a shelf, they’re launched and land right in the hands of real users.
* **Collaborative environment** 
   - be part of a passionate, supportive team that thrives on curiosity and shared success.



  





**Ready to join?** 




 If you’re passionate about crafting extraordinary experiences and have the expertise to back it up, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and show us how you’ll help us redefine what’s possible. Although we love using AI tools, we’d prefer if you’d apply for this role using your own thoughts and words.
 



  





 Welcome to Forefront Ignite – where creativity meets impact and ideas turn into action.

title: Marketing Director [Sweden/Amsterdam]
description:
**This is more than a job —** 
 It’s a chance to create something extraordinary.
 **If you’re passionate about driving growth, shaping a beloved brand, and making a real difference in the world of veterinary care,** 
 we want to hear from you !
 



  





**About AniCura:** 




 AniCura is a family of well-known animal hospitals and clinics specializing in veterinary care for companion animals. AniCura provides modern, high-quality veterinary care for pets at circa 500 practices in 17 European countries and creates peace of mind for pet owners through excellent access and patient safety. AniCura has a turnover of around $1B with the aspiration to expand business through a combination of organic growth and new hospital acquisitions. Every year, AniCura’s 12,000 passionate veterinary professionals attend to four million companion animal patients. Since 2018, AniCura has been a part of Mars Veterinary Health, a family-owned company focused on veterinary care.
 



  





**Job purpose:** 




 Are you a dynamic marketing leader who thrives on making an impact? Do you have the vision and expertise to position AniCura as the go-to provider of veterinary care across Europe? We are searching for a
 **Marketing Director** 
 who will be the driving force behind AniCura’s brand growth, leveraging
 **data, technology, and creativity** 
 to
 **engage pet owners, enhance customer experience, and strengthen our market position.** 




  





 As a
 **key strategic partner to the President and Leadership Team** 
 , you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AniCura’s marketing, ensuring we continue to evolve and lead in a competitive landscape.
 



  





 Your mission? To build
 **a strong, trusted, and recognizable brand** 
 , create
 **seamless customer journeys** 
 , and foster
 **long-term relationships with pet owners and veterinary professionals.** 




  





**Summary:** 



1. **Job Title** 
 : Marketing Director
2. **Department** 
 : Marketing
3. **Reports To:** 
 AniCura President
4. **Location:** 
 The Netherlands or Sweden
5. **Languages:** 
 Proficiency in English and any other European language is a plus.
6. **Other key relationships:** 
 Member of AniCura Leadership Team.
7. **Direct reports:** 
 2 direct reports AniCura Marketing team, plus dotted line Market Marketing Heads.



  





**Roles & Responsibilities:** 



* **Growth Strategy:** 
 Develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy aligned with AniCura’s business objectives. Identify new market opportunities, analyze customer insights, and leverage competitive intelligence to drive brand positioning and business expansion. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate branding, customer segmentation, campaigns, product offerings, and customer experience initiatives.
* **Research & Insights:** 
 Optimize and leverage CRM systems to enhance customer engagement and retention. Use advanced analytics to improve targeting, segmentation, and loyalty programs, ensuring customer-centric strategies that drive growth and long-term value.
* **Funnel Optimization & Customer Journey Mapping:** 
 Oversee the entire customer journey, from awareness to loyalty, ensuring a seamless experience across digital and physical touchpoints. Enhance brand visibility, refine the consideration phase, and drive conversion by improving online interactions, appointment booking processes, and in-clinic experiences.
* **Digital & Performance Marketing:** 
 Lead a cutting-edge digital marketing strategy across SEO, SEM, social media, email, and other digital channels. Oversee UX and brand design to ensure a unified and engaging customer experience. Leverage data-driven insights to enhance personalization, optimize media spend, and improve conversion rates. Stay ahead of digital trends to maintain AniCura’s competitive edge.
* **Brand Development & Thought Leadership:** 
 Strengthen AniCura’s brand identity and market presence. Develop compelling storytelling, content marketing, and PR strategies that reinforce AniCura’s reputation as a trusted provider of veterinary care. Ensure consistency in messaging and brand voice across all markets.
* **Leadership & Culture:** 
 Build and develop a high-performing marketing team, fostering a collaborative, innovative, and customer-centric culture. Lead, mentor, and support team members, driving performance excellence and professional growth. Manage external partnerships with agencies and vendors to enhance marketing capabilities.
* **Stakeholder Collaboration & Cross-Functional Alignment:** 
 Work closely with internal stakeholders, including operations, finance, and clinical teams, to align marketing efforts with business goals. Foster strong relationships within the AniCura network and across the broader Mars Veterinary Health ecosystem.



  





**Education and professional qualifications:** 



* University degree or the equivalent combination of education, training and experience that provides the required knowledge, skills, and abilities.



  





**Key Competencies:** 



* **Strategic Vision:** 
 Ability to align marketing strategies with organizational goals and anticipate market trends.
* **Relationship Building:** 
 High emotional intelligence to inspire trust and collaboration among stakeholders.
* **Matrix Organization Collaboration:** 
 Experienced in navigating complex matrix structures, effectively coordinating across functions and geographies to drive alignment and achieve shared goals.
* **Execution Excellence:** 
 Strong focus on achieving results, taking calculated risks, and adapting to ambiguity.
* **Leadership:** 
 Skilled at motivating teams, managing performance, and building a culture of continuous improvement.



  





**What We’re Looking for:** 



* 15+ years of experience in Marketing, including 5+ years in a Senior Leadership role (Board/Leadership Team level preferred).
* Proven expertise in brand development, digital marketing, customer experience, and analytics-driven decision-making.
* Strong leadership skills – ability to build and develop teams in a matrix organization
* Excellent strategic thinking and execution abilities with a focus on growth, performance, and innovation.
* Experience managing budgets and media spend optimization.
* Outstanding communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Fluent in English (additional European languages a plus)
* Employment Visa: Preference for Candidates with a Valid Work Permit



  





**Our offer:** 



* Join a purpose driven company, where we’re striving to shape the future of veterinary care, together.
* An industry competitive salary and benefits package
* A stimulating work environment with good opportunities for personal development
* Freedom to take responsibility and the opportunity to influence
* Flexible working hours, hybrid working, international, digital work environment
* Learning and development opportunities
* The opportunity to cuddle our beloved 4-legged friends in our offices.
* We are always open for a conversation to discuss your individual needs.



  





**If this sounds like you** 




 Please contact
 **Lekya Kanamarlapudi, Group Corporate Recruiter** 
 , who is happy to tell you more about this opportunity and the recruitment process. Or apply by submitting your resume through clicking the apply button below.
 



  





**AniCura is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from candidates with diverse backgrounds.**

title: Graphic Designer
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We’re seeking a skilled Graphic Designer to join our Creative Team in Stockholm. In this role, you will support our Swedish brands and core marketing team, creating high-quality visual assets that engage and inspire.
   

  

 If you’re passionate about design, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and have a keen eye for detail, we’d love to hear from you!

 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry.  Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!

title: Senior E-Commerce Analyst
description:
**Are you passionate about using data to shape digital strategies and optimize customer experiences?** 




  





**Do you have a proven track record of transforming insights into impactful e-commerce growth?** 




  





**Can you see the story behind the numbers and drive innovation in the competitive fashion industry?** 




  





 MacGregor Black is partnering with a
 **Leading Fashion Brand** 
 to find a
 **Senior E-Commerce Analyst** 
 to enhance their digital presence and drive sales across global markets.
 



  





**About the Role:** 




 As the Senior E-Commerce Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the digital strategy for a globally recognized fashion brand. You will harness the power of data to improve customer journeys, optimize conversion rates, and identify growth opportunities in e-commerce channels.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Analyze website performance, customer behavior, and sales data to uncover insights and opportunities.
* Develop and monitor KPIs, providing regular reports to stakeholders to support decision-making.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize site performance, including conversion rate optimization (CRO) and user experience (UX).
* Conduct A/B testing to evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns, site changes, and customer engagement strategies.
* Identify trends in global and regional e-commerce markets to inform strategy and enhance competitive advantage.
* Support the implementation of analytics tools and platforms to improve data collection and reporting processes.



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 




  




* Bachelor’s degree in Business, Data Analytics, Marketing, or a related field.
* 3+ years of experience in e-commerce analytics, preferably within the fashion or retail industry.
* Proficiency in tools like Google Analytics, Tableau, or Power BI, and familiarity with e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Magento, or Salesforce Commerce Cloud.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a data-driven approach to decision-making.
* Excellent communication skills to present findings and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Fluency in English; Swedish or additional languages are a plus.



  





**What’s in It for You?** 




  




* Join a dynamic team at the forefront of digital innovation in the fashion industry.
* Opportunity to work with a globally recognized brand with ambitious growth plans.
* Competitive salary and benefits, along with flexible working arrangements.



  





 For more information contact
 **Gabby Zachrisson** 
 today.

title: Interim Senior Product Manager (confidential assigment)
description:
Our client is an innovative and fast-moving health-tech company on a mission to revolutionize healthy living through technology and AI-driven solutions. With millions of users worldwide, they’re committed to empowering individuals to build healthier, more sustainable habits through an intuitive and engaging platform.
 



  





 As part of their evolution, they are embracing an AI-first approach to enhance their product experience, drive personalization, and create seamless user journeys.
 



  





**We are looking for** 




 We are looking for a Interim Senior Product Manager to join the team in Stockholm. In this role, you will play a key part in defining and delivering innovative health-tech solutions that transform user needs and market opportunities into actionable strategies. Working in a cross-functional setup, you’ll collaborate closely with developers, designers, UX specialists, and business stakeholders to drive innovation, align teams, and create meaningful value for users.
 



  





**What we are looking for in ideal candidates:** 



* Experience working with cross-platform solutions, including both apps and platforms, within the consumer domain.
* Experience with generative AI, understanding of how AI can optimize workflows and influence priorities.
* Change management – Ability to help teams quickly adapt to new strategies and work methods.
* Data-driven decision-making – Capability to analyze and use data for better prioritization and resource management.
* Stakeholder management – Confident in handling stakeholders at various levels and driving alignment.



  





**The assignment will start as soon as possible, so we are looking for someone who can be available on short notice. The assignment will last approximately six months.**

title: Senior Banknote Designer
description:
Join Our Diverse Team At Crane Currency As a Senior Banknote Designer In Tumba Or Malta And Be a Part Of Our Journey Towards Innovation And Excellence. Who We Are
   

  

 Crane Currency is a premier industrial technology company and a pioneer in currency manufacturing and advanced micro-optics technology for securing physical products. Yes, chances are you have our product in your wallet right now! Our sophisticated equipment and software leverages proprietary core capabilities with detection and sensing technologies. Around the world, our customers trust us to anticipate their needs with innovative, reliable, and high-quality currency & authentication solutions and services—just as they have for generations.
   

  

**How You Will Make An Impact**
 This role provides you an opportunity where millions of people one day may be holding your design work. Our customers look to you and the global design team to bring their currency and security design dreams into reality. You will utilize your skills, and develop new ones, to design our customer's currency or security products. You will design functional works of art that will forever be embedded into history.
   

  

 In your role as a Banknote Designer at Crane Currency you will:
   

  

* Design Banknotes Create secure, visually appealing designs for new and existing banknotes. Develop design proposals and presentations for business.
* Create and prototype security features, ensuring their functionality and quality throughout the design process.
* Incorporate Security Features: Integrate advanced anti-counterfeiting measures into Banknote Designs to prevent fraud.
* Conduct Research: Investigate cultural and historical elements to incorporate into banknote designs, ensuring they are meaningful and relevant.
* Stay Updated on Trends: Keep abreast of the latest trends in design and security to continuously improve banknote designs.
* Collaborate with Stakeholders: Work with government officials, security experts, and printing companies to ensure designs meet all requirements.
* Increase the quantity and efficiency of the design team output and ensure the quality, creativity and innovation of the team’s output are at the highest level.


****Knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role:****
****Required:****
* 3-5-year University level education and/or working experience within Arts & Crafts, Graphic design, Fine arts, Product Design or similar.
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in designing banknotes, security features and printing methods.
* Minimum 3-5 years of demonstrated experience in security software (Corvina, The One) and Adobe such as Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign.
* Experience in managing multiple work streams and meeting deadlines for customers and production through teamwork.
* Fluent in English, all other languages are a benefit.
* All candidates must submit a portfolio/personal website to be considered.


**Preferred** 
  

  

* Artistic graphic design talent with project management skills and a passion for learning and professional development.
* Experience as an effective communicator in design team collaborations, with strong interpersonal and graphic design skills.


****Malta - Benefits****
****How we will care for you:****
 We offer top-notch benefits including free health insurance, personal development opportunities, well-being and community engagement activities, competitive compensation, and a transport allowance. Discover more about our benefits here
   

  

****Tumba-Benefits****
**How We Will Care For You**
 We offer top-notch medical benefits including a wellness allowance and reimbursement for medicines and medical care, opportunities for personal development, community engagement activities, competitive compensation, vacation, parental leave, and multiple tiers of retirement plans. Discover more about our benefits here
   

  

**What Drives Our Team**
 We are a passionate team of 1,200 creators and problem solvers, united by our purpose, we give people confidence every day in moments that matter. This comes to life through our Shared Values:
   

  

* People Matter
* Do the Right Thing
* Trusted Partner
* Innovate for Growth
* Always Improving


**Learn More About Our Values And Culture**
 You can also check us out at:
   

  

**Where We Are**
*This role can be based in Tumba or Malta.*
 Information about Malta, Ħal Far: Ħal Far is the largest industrial estate in Malta. It is at the southern extreme of Malta, between the localities of Birżebbuġa , Safi and Żurrieq . Check out what makes Malta a great place to live and work here:
   

  

 Information about Tumba, Stockholm: Located in the historic Tumba Bruk area, ten-minute walking distance from the train station, 30 km south of Stockholm, and about 20 minutes from Stockholm Central Station. Check out what makes Tumba a great place to live and work here:
   

  

 Crane Currency is a drug free workplace.
   

  

 Crane NXT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, national origin or any other characteristic protected under applicable local law.

title: Technology Solution Architect inom Financial Services
description:
Enheten
 **Financial Services** 
 är en del av en global organisation inom Capgemini vilket innebär att vi arbetar med kunder i Sverige men också i andra länder i Europa. I Stockholm består vårt team av drivna kollegor med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter och vi arbetar med de största bank- och försäkringsbolagen. Du kommer erbjudas möjlighet att utvecklas som konsult både i lokala kundleveranser och i större globala åtaganden.
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 Som
 **Technology Solution Architect** 
 blir du en del av vårt agila konsultteam med bred IT-kompetens. Du kommer att analysera och utforma arkitektur- och molnlösningar utifrån kundens behov, krav och processer. Genom att kombinera kundinsikter, domänkunskap, branschpraxis och innovativa teknologier kommer du att bidra med lösningar för våra kunders transformationsprojekt inom bank- och finansbranschen. I rollen integrerar du kund- och marknadsperspektiv med bästa praxis för att leverera tydliga affärsfördelar. Dessutom har du möjlighet att forma och utveckla vår växande enhet i Sverige.
   

  

*Vanliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:*
* Ta fram lösningsdesign genom att uföra detaljerade analyser av affärs utmaningar samt tekniska förutsättningar.
* Ta fram och etablera roadmaps kopplat till affär och teknologi.
* Driva innovation och säkerställa att tekniska lösningar överensstämmer med etablerad praxis i branschen och kundens krav.
* Möjliggöra högkvalitativa leveranser genom att förstå affärsbehov och skräddarsy lösningar.
* Leda initiativ och team av konsulter hos våra kunder.
* Arbeta som en del av ett globalt team av arkitekter.
* Mentorskap, se till att teamet ligger i framkanten inom olika teknologier, vilket främjar innovation och tillväxt inom gruppen.


**DIN PROFIL**
* 7+ års erfarenhet av teknik, arkitektur och digital transformation ifrån bank- och försäkringsbranschen.
* Rådgivande färdigheter inom molnarkitektur och migrering (PaaS/IaaS/SaaS – Pivotal Cloud Foundry, AWS, Azure).
* Erfarenhet av applikationsintegration, agil infrastrukturarkitektur, skalbar arkitektur och datamodellering.
* Erfarenhet av API- och tjänstebaserade arkitekturer med SOAP, REST API, mikrotjänster och användning av JSON för webb- eller mobilapplikationer.
* Kunskap om CI/CD - verktyg som t.ex. Azure, Confluence, Jira, Jenkins, Git, GitHub, Stash, SonarQube.
* Insikter i DevOps processer samt lösningar kopplade till Scrum, Kanban, Lean UX och XP.
* Erfarenhet av strategisk rådgivning med fokus på affärsresultat.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, då vi har en nära dialog med våra kunder.
* TOGAF erfarenhet är en fördel.


**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**
 Vi erbjuder en möjlighet att gå med i en liten men växande enhet för att vara med och påverka samt forma framtiden inom gruppen. För oss är delaktighet och gemenskapen viktig och vi ses så ofta vi kan under gemensamma aktiviteter som lunchträffar, afterworks och kompetensutbyte. Vi hjälper dig med kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, certifieringar och intressanta kunduppdrag för en gedigen karriärutveckling.
   

  

**ANSÖKAN**
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss! Vi inleder våra processer med att prata om vad du är intresserad av att göra som nästa steg och vi är genuint nyfikna på vilka faktorer som får dig att trivas på jobbet.

title: Senior CRO Analyst
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
 We are looking for a Conversion Rate Optimization Analyst to join our CRO team within the product division. Our team collaborates with development teams to create engaging iGaming experiences by monitoring and analysing website and app performance.
   

  

 You’ll be part of a collaborative team of nine, including four analysts focused on enhancing user experiences. The team shares knowledge daily, supporting each other on product insights, web/app psychology, data validation, and process improvements. Collaboration and mutual support are key to our culture.
   

  

 Our goal is to make our websites and apps more user-friendly and effective at converting visitors into customers. As part of the CRO team, you’ll help drive data-informed decisions and foster a culture of experimentation.
   

  

 This role will be focused on apps and you will collaborate closely with the product specialists (app product owner, app developers), tracking specialists and UX designers to refine the user journey and optimise our internal CRO processes. If you’re passionate about making an impact and working in a supportive, collaborative environment, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Analysing the data from our primary apps, responding to data requests and visualising, as well as communicating your findings to various stakeholders across the business
* Conducting qualitative and quantitative research to understand the needs and behaviour of our app visitors
* Identifying user pain points and issues that are preventing our app visitors from completing a desired action and creating clear and data driven hypotheses
* Execution, analysis and documentation of A/B tests on apps
* Subject Matter Expert for key digital analytics tools


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**MUST HAVEs:**
* 5 years of experience in Google Analytics or other analytics platforms
* Experience running A/B tests in any of the experimentation tools (i.e. Optimizely, Kameleoon, LaunchDarkly, Firebase)
* Experience on the similar position as a digital analyst, CRO analyst or web or app traffic analyst
* Experience in SQL (especially Big Query)
* Experience in managing projects and processes


**NICE TO HAVEs:**
* Experience in behavioural analytics tool (Contentsquare, Hotjar, Fullstory or similar)


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: Quality Assurance Developer for Charging Services, Customer Digitalization
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

 Are you a curious Quality Assurance Developer, with a passion for quality and customer experience, and want to be at the forefront of building a sustainable future for the transport industry?
   

  

 Join us in our mission to optimize daily work for our customers and reduce CO2 emissions through the power of digitalization, electrification and connected vehicles!
   

  

 The Charging Services team at Scania develops Digital Services based on data from Battery Electric connected vehicles, delivering them through our web application and mobile app, and we are now seeking a dedicated Quality Assurance Developer with a strong focus on Customer Experience and a deep sense of responsibility for leading QA efforts within the team.
   

  

**The role**
 You will contribute with feedback on functionality, performance and other quality measurements continuously during all team activities.
   

  

 Key responsibilities:
   

  

  

* Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using tools such as Cypress
* Implement test automation frameworks from scratch and integrate with CI/CD pipelines for continuous testing.
* Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases.
* Support with execution of manual and automated test cases and provide detailed bug reports.
* Develop automated test suites for API and backend testing using tools such as Postman or REST-Assured.
* Conduct performance and load testing using tools like JMeter or LoadRunner and report on system behavior under stress.
* Collaborate with the team to report bugs and drive resolutions using Jira.
* Ensure compatibility across multiple platforms and browsers, using tools such as BrowserStack or Sauce Labs when needed.
* Integrate automated tests with continuous integration/continuous delivery tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI) to streamline deployment processes.
* Work closely with product managers, product owner, developers, and UX designers to ensure testing efforts align with business goals and user expectations.
* Actively participate in Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives, ensuring QA integration into every development sprint.
* Document and report on test results, automation coverage, and key performance indicators to ensure business stakeholders understand quality levels and risks.
* Conducting field tests on Scania’s electrified vehicles to validate software and system performance.
* Prioritize test cases based on business risks, ensuring critical features are thoroughly tested.
* Promote a quality-first mindset across the team, ensuring that QA is integrated into every stage of development.
* Advocate for testing and quality assurance in planning sessions, code reviews, and daily stand-ups


**Required Skills & Qualifications**
 To be successful in this role we believe you have a combination of Technical, Business and Soft Skills:
   

  

  

* Proficiency in tools like Selenium, Cypress, TestNG, or JUnit for developing robust automation scripts.
* Proficiency in Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript for scripting and building automation frameworks.
* Experience with mobile app automation tools like Appium for cross-platform mobile testing.
* Familiarity with Git or similar version control systems for managin and collaborating on codebases.
* Ability to generate and analyze quality metrics, test coverage reports, and present insights to stakeholders.
* Ability to leverage data to optimize testing efforts and assess the effectiveness of automation strategies.
* Knowledge of security standards and compliance requirements, ensuring quality tests cover potential vulnerabilities.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills to clearly report testing outcomes, risks, and improvements to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to analyze complex technical issues and their impact on business outcomes, with solutions that mitigate risk.
* Ability to view software from the user’s perspective, ensuring that the product meets customer expectations
* Strong ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams, especially in Agile environments.
* Flexibility to adapt to new tools, technologies, and business priorities in a fast-paced environment.
* At least 5 years of relevant work experience


 But most of all… we think you have the right curious mindset and passion for software testing!
   

  

**About The Team**
 In our team, we take an end-to-end responsibility together - whatever we build, we need to quality assure, deploy and of course run ourselves. To enhance the team's autonomy, each member must continuously develop their skills and competencies, with mutual support from one another.
   

  

 You will join a vibrant and diverse team where collaboration, innovation, and fun go hand in hand. We thrive on teamwork, support each other through every challenge, and celebrate every success. As part of our
   

  

 multicultural crew, you'll have opportunities to grow, learn, and shape your career. We believe in empowering each other, and every new challenge within the industry we work is a chance to expand your skills and take your professional journey to the next level. Plus, we make sure to enjoy the ride—because loving what you do is just as important as getting it done!
   

  

**For further information**
 Please contact: Flávia Alves (Head of Charging Solutions), flavia.x.alves@scania.com. A background check might be conducted for this position.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
If you are a professional looking for an opportunity to grow and develop your abilities within a dynamic business, Emerson has an appealing role for you!  



  

As a **Senior Software Engineer** you will be included in our System Software group within the Engineering department, focusing on developing pioneering monitoring software for our customers. We are building web-based software products using a microservice architecture, with .Net and C# for backend and Vue.js for the frontend. We are working according to the Scrum methodology in smaller teams, which gives us considerable autonomy in our daily work. The product you will work on collects and analyzes data from different devices such as our radar-level sensors. You will be involved in the full product lifecycle, from creating innovative new features to maintaining and optimizing existing software, as well as contributing to the design, development and ongoing evolution of the software.


If this sounds like an interesting job for you, we welcome your application!


**In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**

* Create, update and maintain specifications and software code according to software development release plan.
* Design and implement new functionalities in the source code.
* Participate in software peer reviews (such as design reviews, code reviews, test reviews, etc.)
* Create and perform unit, component and software tests.
* Analyse system requirements and define functional and non-functional software requirements.

**Who You Are:**

You experiment with a wide range of existing technologies while applying new and emerging options that can enhance organizational outcomes. You facilitate an open dialogue with a wide variety of contributors and stakeholders. You persist in the face of challenges and setbacks.


**For This Role, You Will Need:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or other relevant field.
* Solid experience developing systems in .NET platform with C#.
* Database management experience with tools such as PostgreSQL and MSSQL.
* Communication skills, fluent in English, both verbal and written.
* Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively in cross-functional teams.

**Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:**

* Experience working in a Linux environment.
* Knowledge of frontend development tools such as TypeScript/JavaScript with Vue.js.
* Experience with Azure DevOps and CI/CD workflows.
* Experience configuring and managing Kubernetes.

**ADDITIONAL INFORMATION**

This position is located in Mölnlycke with the possibility to work from home one day a week.


If you have any questions or want to know more about us, don't hesitate to contact Thomas Duhr, Manager System Software at thomas.duhr@emerson.com .


Welcome with your application no later than March 2 nd , 2025 but please note we follow a process of continuous selection and will close the vacancy when we find the right candidate.


Kindly note that due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career site.


No calls or agencies, please!


**Our Offer to You:**

At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspire innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers. We’re emphasizing a culture of togetherness – one that builds community, prioritizes collaboration and continuous improvement.


The philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion at Emerson .


Moreover, our global volunteer employee resource groups will empower you to connect with peers that share the same interest, promote diversity and inclusion and positively contribute to communities around us.


We understand the importance of work-life balance and are dedicated to supporting our employees' personal and professional needs. From competitive benefits plans and comprehensive medical care to equitable opportunities for growth and development we strive to create a workplace that is supportive and rewarding. Our work schedule aims at creating new levels of growth, build a stronger community and provide greater professional development for our employees.


Make this great opportunity yours!


  
**WHY EMERSON**

**Our Commitment to Our People**

**At Emerson, we are motivated by a spirit of collaboration that helps our diverse, multicultural teams across the world drive innovation that makes the world healthier, safer, smarter, and more sustainable. And we want you to join us in our bold aspiration.**

**We have built an engaged community of inquisitive, dedicated people who thrive knowing they are welcomed, trusted, celebrated, and empowered to solve the world’s most complex problems — for our customers, our communities, and the planet. You’ll contribute to this vital work while further developing your skills through our award-winning employee development programs. We are a proud corporate citizen in every city where we operate and are committed to our people, our communities, and the world at large. We take this responsibility seriously and strive to make a positive impact through every endeavor.**

**At Emerson, you’ll see firsthand that our people are at the center of everything we do. So, let’s go. Let’s think differently. Learn, collaborate, and grow. Seek opportunity. Push boundaries. Be empowered to make things better. Speed up to break through. Let’s go, together.**

**Accessibility Assistance or Accommodation**

**If you have a disability and are having difficulty accessing or using this website to apply for a position, please contact:** **idisability.administrator@emerson.com** **.**

**ABOUT EMERSON**

**Emerson is a global leader in automation technology and software. Through our deep domain expertise and legacy of flawless execution, Emerson helps customers in critical industries like life sciences, energy, power and renewables, chemical and advanced factory automation operate more sustainably while improving productivity, energy security and reliability.**

**With global operations and a comprehensive portfolio of software and technology, we are helping companies implement digital transformation to measurably improve their operations, conserve valuable resources and enhance their safety.**

**We offer equitable opportunities, celebrate diversity, and embrace challenges with confidence that, together, we can make an impact across a broad spectrum of countries and industries. Whether you’re an established professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring possibilities, or a recent graduate with an advanced degree, you’ll find your chance to make a difference with Emerson. Join our team – let’s go!**

**No calls or agencies please.**
