***Tungsten Automation Corporation, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/Disability/Vets***

title: Sektionschef Technical Support Group
description:
**Om Försvarsmaktens internationella Centrum (Swedint)**
 Försvarsmaktens internationella Centrum (Swedint) med Nordic Centre for Gender in Military Operations (NCGM) är Försvarsmaktens kompetenscentrum för integrerad multinationell stabsutbildning, förberedande insatsutbildning samt genderperspektiv på taktisk och operativ nivå. Swedint har i uppgift att planera, genomföra, utvärdera och utveckla induviduell stabsutbildning samt insatsutbildning inom ramen för Nato, FN och EU.
   

  

 På Swedint erbjuds du goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling genom direkt närhet till vårt kursutbud och breda samarbetsforum nationellt och internationellt. Våra kurser är meriterande mot Natobefattningar och internationella organisationer.
   

  

**Om Technical Support Group (TSG)**
 Sektionschef TSG arbetsleder tre It-tekniker. Alla befattningar i gruppen har sina specialinriktningar men korsvis kompetensöverlappning är nödvändig eftersom det är en liten sektion som ibland behöver överta uppgifter från varandra. I arbetet jobbar du dagligen med att leda och prioritera uppgifter, samt utveckling och projekt, rörande de tekniska plattformarna vid SWEDINT och NCGM. Befattningen innebär att arbetsleda tekniker för arbetet kring det interna utbildningsnätverket och stödet till våra internationella kurser samt att hålla teknisk dokumentation så som SOP:er, guider etc. uppdaterade. Utöver det förväntas du ha ett driv att kontinuerligt förbättra den tekniska plattformarna så att kurserna kan fortsätta hålla hög nivå. Denna utveckling kan handla om att konkret få teknisk utrustning godkänd och på plats utefter Försvarsmaktens speciella regler och krav. En annan viktig del är att vara POC mot regementsstaben (G6). Kontinuerlig kontakt med kurschefer för att samordna stöd är en del av arbetet. Befattningen ger gott om utrymme för idéer och initiativ.
   

  

 Utöver de administrativa och arbetsledande uppgifterna så ingår också en del teknisk konfiguration, arbete med Active Directory och krav på djup teknisk kunskap vid olika projekt osv. så teknisk utbildning och djup förståelse för servrar och Active Directory är ett krav.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Leder och fördelar arbetsuppgifter som rör utbildningsnätverk, IT-infrastruktur och andra inkomna uppgifter.
* Utvecklar det tekniska stödet Swedints och NCGM:s kursverksamhet och att skapa tekniska förutsättningar för kurser och deras utveckling.
* Ansvarar för uppdatering av lektionssalars tekniska utrustning.
* Hanterar kontinuerlig kontakt med regementsstaben (G6) och kurschefer.


**KRAV
   

  

 Kvalifikationer**
* Högskoleutbildning inom datateknik eller motsvarande inriktning.
* Flerårig erfarenhet av serverdrift och arbete i Active Directory.
* Mycket Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska (tal och skrift).
* Erfarenhet av StriSimPC.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Du behöver ha energi till att driva och hålla rätt på flera projekt som ofta pågår parallelt. Ledarskapet behöver vara balanserat mellan resultat och personal. Du skall gärna vara idérik men även ta in gruppens kunskaper och åsikter i beslut.
   

  

***Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.***
**MERITERANDE**
* Genomförd militärtjänstgöring.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i internationell miljö.
* Erfarenhet av internationell tjänstgöring.
* Erfarenhet av datorstödd ledningsträning.
* Certifieringar och fortbildningskurser inom IT-området.


**Övrigt** 
 Anställningsform: Tillsvidare med 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort: Kungsängen
   

  

 Tillträdesdatum: Snarast enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**För upplysningar om befattningen kontakta:** 
 Chef stödavdelningen Raul Arbinus
   

  

**För information om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta:** 
 Personalhandläggare Elin Holmström Borén
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare:**
 SEKO Lise-Lotte Larsson SACO Johan Gillemyr, OFR/S Kenneth Hartikainen/ Mikael Bengtsson OFR/O Orry Finnermark
   

  

**Samtliga nås via växeln: 08-584 540 00.**
**Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025-02-14**
**Din ansökan ska innehålla CV.**
**Vi använder oss av urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev eftersom vi rekryterar kompetensbaserat. Personligt brev undanbedes därför.**
**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Livgardet är ett av Försvarsmaktens största förband med anor från 1521. Vi utbildar morgondagens soldater, liksom militärpoliser och personal som ska genomföra internationell insats. Vi bevakar de kungliga slotten, vi har säkerhets- och markstridsförband. Vi ansvarar också för att bevara och utveckla svensk militärmusiktradition. Vårt huvudsäte är i Kungsängen utanför Stockholm, men vi finns också i Sollentuna, i centrala Stockholm, Uppsala, Göteborg och Karlskrona. Inom Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Onsite Helpdesk Technician
description:
**The Role**
 As an Onsite Helpdesk Technician, you will be responsible for supporting the user experience by managing and maintaining IT and AV assets, providing basic troubleshooting and onsite support, and ensuring the seamless functioning of end-user workstations. This role is essential in maintaining the operational efficiency of our office environment and providing high-quality service to our users.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* User Support: Assist users with receiving and setting up computers (laptop, desktop, Windows 11, macOS) and phones (Android, iOS). Provide basic troubleshooting and onsite support for hardware and software issues, ensuring quick resolution to minimize downtime.
* Workstation Maintenance: Ensure end-user workstations are always functioning, including screens, hubs, and peripherals. Regularly check and maintain equipment, supply peripherals and cables as needed, and proactively address potential issues before they impact users.
* Asset Management: Keep track of all corporate IT assets in the IT/AV environment. Maintain asset records through barcoding and conduct regular audits. Ensure assets are utilized for their mandated period and replace them after the period has passed. Implement efficient inventory management practices to streamline asset tracking and utilization.
* Logitech Teams Rooms Maintenance: Maintain Logitech Teams rooms, ensuring they are patched, updated, and functioning properly. Conduct routine checks and updates to prevent disruptions during meetings and presentations.
* Software Updates: Support laptop version updates, ensuring all devices are up-to-date with the latest software. Coordinate with users to schedule updates at convenient times to minimize disruption.
* Onsite Availability: Always be onsite during office hours to provide immediate support. Be the first point of contact for any IT-related issues, ensuring prompt and effective resolution.
* Minor Repairs and RMAs: Perform minor repairs as needed. Manage RMAs and handle external warranty and repair processes efficiently, coordinating with vendors to ensure timely resolution.
* Engineering Support: Assist engineering teams with tasks on machines, such as investigations or application management. Ensure compliance with all security protocols and procedures during these tasks.
* Onboarding and Offboarding: Support the onboarding and offboarding lifecycle by handing out and collecting machines, ensuring end-users have everything they need from day one. Provide thorough orientation for new hires on IT policies and usage.
* Whiteglove Service: Provide whiteglove service for executive management and directors to ensure maximum uptime for these users. Be proactive in addressing their IT needs and offer personalized support to enhance their productivity.
* Peripheral Management: Ensure all end-user peripherals and cables are in working order and readily available. Conduct regular audits of peripheral stock and reorder as necessary to maintain sufficient supplies.
* Dante Sound Network and OBS: Learn and use a Dante sound network as well as OBS for basic studio presentations conducted by the company. Support users in a producer role for presentations, ensuring high-quality audio-visual output and smooth operation.
* Training and Documentation: Provide training sessions for users on common IT tasks and best practices. Create and maintain documentation for troubleshooting procedures and IT policies to ensure consistency and ease of access for users.
* Collaboration and Teamwork: Work closely with other IT team members and departments to address and resolve complex issues. Participate in team meetings and contribute to the continuous improvement of IT services and support processes.


**Requirements**
* Educational Background: Some educational background in IT or related field. Certifications such as MD-102 are a plus.
* Experience: Entry-level position suitable for newcomers. Demonstrated technical savviness is required. Prior experience in a technical support or helpdesk role is beneficial.
* Technical Skills: Basic understanding of IT hardware and software, including Windows 11, macOS, Android, and iOS. Familiarity with Logitech Teams rooms, Dante sound network, and OBS is a plus.
* Interpersonal Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills, capable of providing excellent customer service to users at all levels within the organization. Ability to explain technical concepts in a clear and understandable manner.
* Organizational Skills: Ability to manage and track IT assets meticulously, ensuring accuracy in asset management and auditing. Strong time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
* Problem-Solving Skills: Proactive and resourceful in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues. Ability to think critically and adapt to changing circumstances.
* Onsite Presence: Must be available onsite during office hours to provide immediate support. Reliable and punctual, with a commitment to providing consistent and dependable service.
* This position offers an excellent opportunity for individuals looking to start their career in IT support, providing hands-on experience in a dynamic office environment. You will gain exposure to a wide range of IT and AV technologies, enhance your technical skills, and contribute to the efficiency and productivity of our organization.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Northmill Bank is a pioneering financial institution at the intersection of technology and finance, committed to revolutionizing the way people manage and protect their financial well-being. We are creating a different kind of banking experience,
 **digital yet personal** 
 .
   

  

 Northmill Bank was founded in 2006 and have grown to over 170 employees in 4 countries, 2.500 merchants and 600.000 end users. We use the latest technology to develop safe, smart, and user-friendly products for our customers. They are the sole reason why we do what we do. We are a 100% cloud-based product company where technology is the driver to create smarter banking products.
   

  

 Grab this opportunity to be a part of us and our journey!
   

  

**About Our Tech Stack**
* Snowflake
* DBT
* AWS
* Fivetran
* ThoughtSpot


**About The Role**
 As a Data Engineer at Northmill Bank you will be part of the entire data lifecycle, from extracting raw data from its sources, loading it into Snowflake and then transforming/modeling the data to fit final business requirements. You will be a part of the cross-functional Credit & Analytics team consisting of Data Scientists and Analysts who serve the whole bank in terms of data for insights, predictive modeling, reporting and all other potential use cases.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Collaborate on building and maintaining our full ELT pipeline, including connecting to various data sources using custom AWS Lambdas and/or Fivetran connectors.
* Utilize DBT to model and transform data, ensuring it's clean, structured, and ready for analysis, reporting and other operational systems.
* Continuously monitor and optimize data flows to proactively drive us forward.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies in data engineering.


**Qualifications**
* 2+ years of experience in a data engineering role
* Proficiency in SQL/Snowflake, DBT and Python.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Experience with cloud platforms, especially AWS, is a plus.
* Have an interest in the underlying business and it’s data needs.


**Fun Facts**
* Work-life balance - hit the gym two minutes away or go for a jog in the city.
* Event - highly appreciated “Northchill”
* Health - 5000 kr health care allowance
* Breakfast and fruits every day, as well as "holy fika” each Friday.
* Regular after work and celebrated successes at the office.
* Stockholm's most beautiful office space, right in the city center with incredible views and our very own roof top terrace.


**Apply today and be a part of Northmill!**
 Northmill is a tech company with a banking license aiming to improve financial life, offer merchants smart solutions and erase the borders between in-store and online.
   

  

 Northmill creates a more personal and relevant experience for people and companies, helping more than 2,500 merchants and 600,000 end users.
   

  

**Saved for users** 
 31 MSEK
   

  

**Trustpilot** 
 4.6 of 5
   

  

**Cloud** 
 100 %
   

  

**End users** 
 600 000

title: Global Account Manager, Sweden
company_industry: Computer Hardware Manufacturing and Software Development
description:
**BE PART OF BUILDING THE FUTURE.**
 What do NASA and emerging space companies have in common with COVID vaccine R&D teams or with Roblox and the Metaverse?
   

  

 The answer is data, -- all fast moving, fast growing industries rely on data for a competitive edge in their industries. And the most advanced companies are realizing the full data advantage by partnering with Pure Storage. Pure’s vision is to redefine the storage experience and empower innovators by simplifying how people consume and interact with data. With 11,000+ customers including 58% of the Fortune 500, we’ve only scratched the surface of our ambitions.
   

  

**Pure Is Blazing Trails And Setting Records**
* For ten straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant
* Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a certified Net Promoter Score in the top 1% of B2B companies globally
* Industry analysts and press applaud Pure’s leadership across these dimensions
* And, our 5,000+ employees are emboldened to make Pure a faster, stronger, smarter company as we go


 If you, like us, say “bring it on” to exciting challenges that change the world, we have endless opportunities where you can make your mark.
   

  

 Pure Storage is seeking a Global Account Manager (GAM) with proven ability to win and then lead a small subset of global Telco accounts. The GAM will coordinate the strategy and team-selling efforts with partners and teammates to close business on a quarterly and annual basis. Proven ability to exceed assigned quota, prospect, close global contracts, and build new and deep relationships with large global customers is key. The successful candidate will have demonstrated the ability to develop long-term relationships with Channel Partners that drive revenue as well as relationships with customers from end users to the line of business to the CxO. Ability to drive satisfied and referenceable customers while maintaining an accurate forecast and working with multiple channel partners is critical. This is a new business, hunter territory that requires experience and proven success opening large accounts.
   

  

**SHOULD YOU ACCEPT THIS CHALLENGE...**
* Prospecting: proven track record of penetrating accounts; reaching decision-makers and closing business.
* Direct strategic account planning and leadership of a global Telco account team
* Establish and manage complex relationship network of ‘C’ level stakeholders and highest level senior internal representatives
* Assemble and work to a detailed strategic account plan designed to deliver value and meet the customer's business and IT objectives
* Coordinate different areas of the organisation to formulate go-to-market strategies for nominated global accounts
* Manage complex customer/ supplier / partner dynamics
* Assess customer, market trends and provide timely and accurate revenue forecasting
* Drive accelerated revenue growth by identifying potential markets for new and existing products and services in accounts
* Identify, pursue and close sales opportunities and leads
* Deliver the necessary input to ensure on-time delivery of high quality proposals for managed accounts and prospects as well cost of ownership illustrations and business value justifications
* Develop sales, business and relationship plan for accounts


**What You’ll Need To Bring To This Role...**
* Deep understanding of the customer’s business, it’s market and industry alongside key decision-makers and influencers in account organization
* Ability to translate customer’s objectives and strategy into relevant Pure proposition
* Ability to effectively communicate at all levels of an organisation, including the C-suite
* Liaise with Global Enterprise Senior Management as required for executive level sponsorship program
* Experience of working with major Nordics Telco Global Accounts
* Experienced working with C Level (internal and customers)
* Strong decision-making skills – able to identify key business issues
* Strong communication skills – able to convey understanding and messaging in a clear, concise and compelling manner, both verbally and in writing.
* 7-10 yrs.+ successful global accounts/enterprise solution selling within technology services
* 7-10 yrs.+ Enterprise sales experience
* Ability to lead and manage an international and distributed team.
* Ability to think strategically and drive sales transformation programs
* Deep work experience in Telecommunications / IT Industry
* Enterprise Storage desirable
* Excellent communicator (Verbal, Written, Presentation)


**BE YOU—CORPORATE CLONES NEED NOT APPLY.**
 Pure is where you ask big questions, think differently, and make an impact. This is not just a job, but a place where you have a voice and can accelerate your career. We value unique thoughts and celebrate individuality, and with ample opportunity to learn, develop yourself, and expand into different roles, joining Pure is an investment in your career journey.
   

  

 Through our Pure Equality program, which supports a flourishing field of employee resource groups, we nourish the personal and professional lives of our team members. And our Pure Good Foundation gives back to local and global communities through volunteering and grants.
   

  

 And because we understand the value of bringing your full and best self to work, we offer a variety of perks to manage a healthy balance, including flexible time off, wellness resources, and company-sponsored team events.
   

  

**PURE IS COMMITTED TO EQUALITY.**
 Research shows that in order to apply for a job, women feel they need to meet 100% of the criteria while men usually apply after meeting about 60%. Regardless of how you identify, if you believe you can do the job and are a good match, we encourage you to apply.
   

  

 Pure is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or any other characteristic legally protected by the laws of the jurisdiction in which you are being considered for hire.
   

  

 If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at
 **TA-Ops@purestorage.com** 
 .
   

  

**APPLICANT & CANDIDATE PERSONAL INFORMATION PRIVACY NOTICE.**
 If you're wondering how or why Pure collects or uses information you provide, we invite you to check out our Applicant & Candidate Personal Information Protection Notice.
   

  

**DEEMED EXPORT LICENSE NOTICE.**
 Some positions may require a deemed export license for compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Please note: Pure does not currently sponsor deemed export license applications so we are unable to proceed with applicants requiring stated sponsorship.

title: Database Engineer
description:
Do you aim to have a dynamic impact on the world?
   

  

 Do you want to go beyond what’s possible?
   

  

 Are you up for creating solutions and solving tomorrow’s problems today?
   

  

 Then we have the opportunity for you!
   

  

 We are looking for an exceptionally talented database engineer to help tackle some of the most complex problems in the world and drive a revolutionary transformation in the field of logistics. We are specifically looking for individuals already proven their skills in designing and constructing large, intricate systems that are also easily maintainable.
   

  

*Airmee is a well-capitalized start-up backed by some of Sweden’s leading investors. As one of Europe's fastest growing logistics startups, we specialize in fast and convenient deliveries for retailers and businesses. Our cutting-edge technology, developed through extensive research at KTH, enables us to optimize our logistics fleet in real-time, delivering superior cost-efficiency and environmental sustainability.*
**What are we looking for?**
 We are looking for a Database Engineer to join our team responsible for internationally scaling the services offered by Airmee. As a Database Engineer, you will play a vital role in designing and developing databases, as well as optimizing our infrastructure to efficiently handle growing data loads.
   

  

 Our AWS Lambda (NodeJS and Python) APIs are connected to AWS RDS (PostgreSQL) instances. The entire system infrastructure is hosted on AWS.
   

  

 Proficiency in test-driven development is a must, as we strive for comprehensive test coverage of 100%. We place strong emphasis on well-documented and readable code, so we expect you to write clean code and document it thoroughly.
   

  

 You should be comfortable working with staging and production environments, ensuring smooth transitions between the two.
   

  

 You have considerable experience maintaining and scaling up databases, in particular on indexing databases and managing connection pooling and latency.
   

  

 At Airmee, we appreciate a strong work ethic, and we believe in fostering a positive and collaborative environment that encourages growth and success. Join us on our mission to reshape the logistics industry and make a lasting impact on the world.
   

  

**Skills & Requirements**
**We believe that you have:**
* a minimum of 5 years of experience managing large scale relational databases
* experience working with database multi tenancy
* experience working with large scale database indexing, database replication and high availability databases
* experience working with caches in front of databases for load offsetting
* have experience handling PostgreSQL instances hosted on AWS RDS
* Monitor and optimize database performance using indexing, query tuning, and caching.
* Optimize database performance and monitor using AWS CloudWatch and Performance Insights.


 It will be amazing if you also,
   

  

* have at least one project on a public repository (any sharable repository would work)
* experience working with Serverless technology, ideally on AWS Lambdas that make use of database connections
* you are a contributor to the open source community
* Perform backup and recovery strategies using pg\_dump, pg\_basebackup, and WAL archiving.


**Why join us?**
 At our company, you'll have the chance to collaborate with a diverse group of highly skilled, motivated, and fascinating colleagues. We value efficiency and excellence, always striving to outperform others, all while having fun and enjoying the process of problem-solving.

title: Backend Engineer - Gaming
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 Join our dynamic Gaming Integration Team, comprising 10 developers and QA experts dedicated to developing and maintaining our cutting-edge Gaming Engine. As a Backend Engineer, you'll play a pivotal role in utilising the latest technologies to craft cloud-based, distributed, scalable, and fault-tolerant microservices capable of handling a staggering volume of gaming transactions—approximately 1.3 billion per month. Collaborating closely with stakeholders, including the Regulatory Reporting Team and game operations teams, you'll spearhead innovative projects such as LeoJackpot while ensuring seamless API integrations and optimising performance for an unparalleled gaming experience. This role is perfect for software craftsmen who thrive in an environment of continual learning, value effective communication, and are eager to push the boundaries of technology within the gaming industry.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Developing and maintaining microservices using Java, Spring, and JPA
* Integrating new gaming providers into the platform via API integration
* Optimising performance and scalability of backend systems
* Collaborating with frontend teams to expose game data via APIs


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* 3+ years of experience with common Java frameworks such as Spring and JPA
* Relational databases such as MySQL
* Building scalable and fault-tolerant systems and are familiar with microservices
* Git/Github
* Issue trackers such as Jira
* Bonus points: elasticsearch, Kafka, Kotlin, Akka, Hazelcast, Consul, Datadog, DOCKER, GraphQL, Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform


 NICE TO HAVES
   

  

* Experience with elasticsearch, Kafka, Kotlin, Akka, Hazelcast, Consul, Datadog, DOCKER,
* GraphQL, Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform


 WHO ARE WE?
   

  

 At the core of LeoVegas Group, is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices world-wide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 If you think you would be a good fit for the Leo pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English we’d like to see your CV in English please\*\*

title: Senior Security Analyst
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i kampen mot cyberhot i en tid då IT-säkerhet står i fokus? Som IT-säkerhetsexpert hos oss på CGI får du chansen att jobba med Sveriges mest kritiska nätverk och kunder, i projekt som formar framtidens säkerhetslandskap. Här får du arbeta med avancerad övervakning och analys samtidigt som du bidrar till att skapa skräddarsydda säkerhetssystem. Tillsammans med erfarna medarbetare skapar ni hållbara säkerhetslösningar i världsklass!
   

  

 Placeringsort: Stockholm/Göteborg
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som senior säkerhetsanalytiker på CGI får du en central roll i att skydda våra kunders viktigaste IT-system. Du kommer ingå i CSIRT teamet och utforma planer samt även lösa pågående incidenter för myndigheter och större företag. Du kommer arbeta både reaktivt och proaktivt för att hjälpa våra kunder till en säkrare IT-miljö.
   

  

 Vidare kommer du att analysera nätverkstrafik, övervaka säkerhetshändelser och hantera incidenter. Du kommer också att ge konkreta rekommendationer till kunder, för att stärka deras säkerhet, och hjälpa till med forensiska utredningar vid behov.
   

  

 Vi använder marknadsledande verktyg inom SIEM, logghantering, identitetshantering och omvärldsbevakning med mera.
   

  

 Du får verka i en miljö där samarbete och stöd från ett globalt expertnätverk är en del av vardagen. Vi erbjuder också tydliga utvecklingsvägar där det finns möjlighet att avancera inom CGI. Om du vill ha en roll där du får jobba med både teknik och säkerhet på riktigt, då är det här jobbet för dig.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med SOC eller som Cyber Security-arkitekt i minst 3 år, samt ha varit involverad i incidenthantering (CSIRT).
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har djup teknisk kompetens och är redo att arbeta med komplexa säkerhetsutmaningar. Du har en akademisk examen inom IT-säkerhet, datavetenskap, nätverk eller motsvarande, alternativt erfarenhet från liknande roller.
   

  

 För denna roll krävs kunskap i minst ett av följande områden; IT-forensik, nätverkstrafikanalys, IDS/IPS, brandväggar, antiviruslösningar, virtualisering och operativsystem.
   

  

 För att möta våra kunders behov är det nödvändigt att du är flytande i både svenska och engelska och kan arbeta i säkerhetsklassade miljöer.
   

  

 I denna roll krävs självledarskap och förmåga att ta ägandeskap över dina uppdrag. Du ska trivas med att arbeta nära kunder, både som rådgivare och teknisk expert, samt kunna samarbeta i agila team där du bidrar med din spetskompetens.
   

  

 Certifieringar inom IT- och cybersäkerhet (exempelvis CompTIA Security+, CEH), och erfarenhet av Cloud-teknologi (Azure, AWS, Google) samt SIEM eller SOAR-lösningar är starkt meriterande. Tidigare erfarenhet som Penetrationstestare eller inom etisk hackning är också en stor fördel.
   

  

 Vi lägger stark vikt vid personliga egenskaper, det är viktigt för oss att du ska trivas i teamet! Om din erfarenhet ligger i linje med, men inte motsvarar alla krav till 100% vill vi ändå uppmana dig att söka jobbet.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 To applicants: Please note that this position requires a Swedish citizenship , and both Swedish and English language skills on a professional level, verbally as well as in writing.
   

  

 This role may also be subject to SUA-classified background check.
   

  

 Som anställd erbjuds du nedan förmåner:
   

  

* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Trygg anställning: Våra medlemmar anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


 Om du har några frågor om tjänsten, kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Erik Löfgren erik.lofgren@cgi.com eller Morgan Ivarsson morgan.ivarsson@cgi.com
   

  

 Vad du kan förvänta dig av oss:
   

  

 Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling tillsammans.
   

  

 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Cybersäkerhetsspecialist till Swedavia Stockholm Arlanda Airport
description:
**Swedavia söker en entusiastiska Cybersäkerhetsspecialister till vår Cybersäkerhetsenhet.
   

  

 Swedavias uppdrag är att äga, driva och utveckla 10 av Sveriges flygplatser, som t.ex. Arlanda, Landvetter och Sturup.**
**Vad innebär rollen?**
 Flygplatser har en komplex IT-miljö, med system och lösningar med allt ifrån IoT/OT till Cloud, vilket behövs för att kunna bedriva flygplatsverksamhet (Airport Operator). Förutom traditionell Office-IT, så finns till exempel även energi- och bagagesystem samt autonoma fordon.
   

  

 För att hålla Swedavia och våra resenärer säkra så kräver det att vi jobbar aktivt med att förebygga och identifiera hot mot vår verksamhet och IT. Vilket gör att vi både måste se helheten men samtidigt inte förbiser detaljerna.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som Cybersäkerhetsspecialist med inriktning på Vulnerability Management hos Swedavia kommer ditt huvudfokus vara att identifiera, analysera och hantera sårbarheter inom vår IT-infrastruktur.
   

  

**Du kommer att:**
* Genomföra regelbundna sårbarhetsanalyser av Swedavias hårdvara, mjukvara och IT-arkitektur för att proaktivt identifiera potentiella säkerhetsrisker.
* Utveckla och implementera strategier och processer för Vulnerability Management för att effektivt hantera identifierade sårbarheter.
* Samarbeta med olika team för att säkerställa att sårbarheter åtgärdas i enlighet med Swedavias säkerhetspolicyer och standarder.
* Stödja riskanalysprocesser genom att tillhandahålla detaljerad information om sårbarheter och deras potentiella inverkan på organisationen.
* Kontinuerligt följa upp och rapportera om framsteg och effektiviteten i hanteringen av sårbarheter till relevanta intressenter.


 I denna roll är det viktigt att du håller dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna och utvecklingen inom cybersäkerhet, särskilt inom området för sårbarhetshantering. Din expertis kommer att vara avgörande för att stärka Swedavias förmåga att skydda sig mot cyberhot och säkerställa en säker och pålitlig drift av våra flygplatser.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi fäster stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som är initiativrik, självgående och van att ta eget ansvar. Du har ett stort intresse och engagemang för Cyber/IT-säkerhet och digital utveckling. Du är analytisk och strukturerad med en förmåga att se till helheten men samtidigt inte förbise detaljerna.
   

  

 Vidare har du en god förmåga att resonera kring teknisk cybersäkerhet ur ett holistiskt perspektiv.
   

  

 Du har praktisk erfarenheter och kunskaper inom cyber/IT-säkerhet (t.ex. så som Applikationssäkerhetstester, Sårbarhetsanalyser, Konfigurationsgranskningar, Intrångstester) samt från att ha jobbat med cyber- och/eller informationssäkerhet med erfarenhet från säkerhetsarbete baserat på metoder, ramverk och lagstiftning (t.ex. IS027000-serien, GDPR och Säkerhetsskyddslagen). Vi ser gärna att du även har erfarenhet från säkerhetsarbete från verksamhetskrav såsom riskanalyser, informationsklassning och incidenthantering.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har högskoleutbildning inom datateknik eller informationsteknik, samt har IT-säkerhetsrelaterade tekniska certifieringar från ISACA, SANS, OSSTMM är meriterande.
   

  

 Du har en god förmåga att kommunicera på svenska och engelska i såväl tal som skrift och får gärna ha erfarenhet av hålla utbildningar och föreläsningar.
   

  

 Swedavia är en säkerhetsklassad, alkohol- och drogfri arbetsplats.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
**Välkommen till en unik arbetsplats där världen möts varje dag!**
 Vi erbjuder en betydelsefull och utvecklande roll i en organisation som präglas av hög professionalism, ett öppet och inkluderande arbetsklimat samt ett starkt fokus på affärsutveckling. Hos oss får du uppleva den dynamiska atmosfären och pulsen som bara en flygplats kan erbjuda.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter olikheter och mångfald – det är en av våra största styrkor och en förutsättning för att kunna fortsätta utvecklas som ett hållbart och innovativt företag.
   

  

**Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta philip.rauf@swedavia.se**
**Sista ansökningsdag är den 5 mars, urval sker löpande och annonsen kan stängas tidigare så tveka inte att söka redan idag!**
**Hur är det att arbeta på Swedavia?**
 Vårt fokus är att möjliggöra hållbart resande och uppmuntra nytänkande för att skapa en välkomnande, trygg och inkluderande arbetsgemenskap där du kan växa och göra verklig skillnad – läs mer här! Jobba hos oss | Om Swedavia
   

  

 Då flygplatser är en säkerhetsklassad verksamhet genomgår samtliga kandidater som går vidare i rekryteringsprocessen en bakgrundskontroll. För vissa tjänster även en säkerhetsprövning. Swedavia är även en drogfri arbetsplats med nolltolerans mot droger. Drogtester genomförs före anställning och sker slumpmässigt under anställningen.

title: Senior Gameplay Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Arbeta med teamet för att skapa och prototypa spelmekaniker tillsammans.
* Balansera, justera och iterera spelkänslan för att leverera en njutbar kärnspelsupplevelse.
* Vara en ambassadör för spelbarhet genom att dela idéer och driva spelarcentrerad design.
* Dokumentera och kommunicera design på ett lättförståeligt sätt.


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Tidigare Unreal Engine erfarenhet, gärna 5+ år
* Jobbat mycket med gameplay eller UI programmering
* Gamepad support i frontend och ingame
* Tidigare AAA erfarenhet
* UI för konsoller
* Övrigt jobb för konsoller tex. beta av TRCs och XRs
* Ett kreativt och nyfiket sinne.
* Förmågan att övervinna unika designutmaningar i ett komplext, öppet sammanhang.
* En flexibel designmentalitet som anpassar sig till och utvecklar teammedlemmars idéer och arbete.
* Förmågan att dokumentera och ge vision samtidigt som du mestadels arbetar praktiskt med programvara och kommunikation.


**Meriterande**
* Angelscript
* Tidigare jobbat med Cert.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 14-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Marketing & Communications Specialist
description:
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Marketing & Communications Specialist to lead digital marketing initiatives, web content, and social media for our client. Working closely with the Marketing & Communications team and the Nordic marketing team, you will execute strategies, enhance digital presence, and drive content-driven campaigns.
   

  

 Ready to make waves? This could be your perfect catch!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Drive digital marketing, web content, and social media for Sweden.
* Work with Marketing Lead Sweden and the Nordic team.
* Execute paid ads, SEO/SEM, and organic social media.
* Create and manage content for web, social media, and newsletters.
* Analyze performance and optimize marketing efforts.
* Support campaigns, events, and brand alignment.
* Adapt global marketing for the Swedish market.
* Ensure a strong, consistent brand presence.
* Stay updated on digital trends and best practices.


**Your** 
**profile**
**Skills**
 You are a detail-oriented and proactive marketing professional with a passion for digital content and data-driven strategies. With strong organizational skills, you thrive in a fast-paced environment and take initiative to drive impactful marketing efforts. You are also:
   

  

* Creative and analytical, with the ability to execute and optimize campaigns.
* Self-motivated and structured, managing multiple tasks efficiently.


**Requirements**
* Native-level Swedish with strong localization skills.
* Experience in digital marketing, content management, and campaigns.
* Proficient in EDGEcrm, Social Media Studio, EPiServer, and Power BI.
* Excellent written and verbal communication.
* Degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.


**Does this sound like you?** 
 If so, let's get in touch! 🐟
   

  

**Start** 
 : ASAP
   

  

**Workload** 
 : 2–3 days per week
   

  

**Duration** 
 : 4 months with the possibility of an extension
   

  

**Location** 
 : At the client's office in Stockholm
   

  

**Last day to apply** 
 : February 7
   

  

**Contact** 
 : hej@fiskenivattnet.se
   

  

*Please note the last application date and know that we leave the jobpost on our web until the assignment is signed. Also kindly send your application in English.*
**About Fisken i Vattnet**
 Welcome to a thoughtful consultant agency with a variety of specialists for contemporary communication and marketing. For us, it's about conveying meaningful contexts where both you and we feel like the "fish in the water".

title: Finance Assistant
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 As a
 **Finance Assistant** 
 you will join our Accounting team which is responsible for accounting for 8 entities in 6 countries. You will support our Account Receivable and Accounts Payable Specialists, who work with several entities/countries, during the summer
 **from the second week of June 2025 to the second week of August 2025.**
**Please note:** 
 This is an
 **hourly-paid** 
 internship on a fixed-term contract. To receive training, we will ask you to be
 **present** 
 at our Stockholm office during
 **June 2025** 
 . Therefore, we welcome candidates within commute distance to Stockholm.
   

  

**In this role, you will:**
* Accounts Payables: Process incoming invoices accurately in Medius on a daily basis.
* Accounts Receivables: Process outgoing invoices accurately in Visma ERP system on a daily basis and process payments from customers through various channels, such as checks, credit cards, and electronic funds transfers.
* Bank Reconciliation: Post and reconcile bank statements daily.
* Perform various other duties such as monitoring Tobii Dynavox's finance mailbox daily and support the organization with finance-related questions.


**What We're Looking For:**
 We are looking for someone who has:
   

  

* Foundational proficiency in using accounting software and invoicing management systems.
* Previous accounting internship or experience (≤ 1 year) in accounts payable or similar roles in finance.
* Basic understanding and familiarity with ERP systems.
* Fluent proficiency in English, both written and verbal.


**What will set you apart:**
* Attention to detail to identify discrepancies and resolve issues.
* Organization and prioritization skills.
* Problem-solving skills.
* Ability to collaborate with team members and other departments within the organization.


**What is next?**
 We're looking forward to your application! You can submit your resume and/or LinkedIn profile (in English only) through our careers page and share your questions with us at mine.hacisalihoglu@tobiidynavox.com.
   

  

**Our Values:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, our mission guides what we do, and our values guide us in how we do it. Across the organization, we are committed to being Collaborative, Considerate, Curious and Courageous. We build a trusting environment where every team member prioritizes our customers with empathy and insight. Bold ideas and learning lead to impactful solutions. Driven by curiosity, we continuously challenge the status quo to create meaningful, customer-focused solutions for our customers.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we believe in empowering individuals – including our employees - to reach their full potential. Here’s what makes us unique:
   

  

* Purpose-Driven Work: Join a company that transforms lives by giving a voice to those with communication challenges. Every day, your work makes a meaningful and concrete impact.
* “Yes, and...” Flexibility: Build a rewarding career AND enjoy time with loved ones. We offer flexible work options so you don’t have to choose between personal and professional goals.
* Growth and Development: Whether you’re advancing your skills or growing your career, we invest in your future with training, learning opportunities, and internal growth paths.
* Inclusive and Supportive Culture: Work in a collaborative, caring environment where diversity and individuality are valued. You’ll feel connected to both your team and our global community.
* A Global Leader with Heart: Be part of an innovative, forward-thinking company that combines experience and cutting-edge solutions with a mission to change lives.

title: Sales Representative DACH
description:
**Role Overview** 




 We are seeking a skilled and dynamic
 **Sales Representative** 
 for DACH to drive sales. This role is ideal for a professional with at least two years of experience in relevant sales roles, preferably within cinematography, photography, or related industries. The ideal candidate will have a strong business mindset, a competitive drive to achieve results, and the ability to build and maintain strong relationships with dealers. Reporting to the Key Account Manager Central, you will play a crucial role in delivering sales results and supporting marketing efforts.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Deliver sales growth and consistently meet or exceed quarterly targets in the DACH region
* Build and nurture strong relationships with dealers, B2B accounts, and end customers
* Support and execute marketing campaigns and product launches, ensuring successful implementation and tracking performance through the Profoto event tracker
* Conduct co-visits with dealers to key B2B accounts, such as rental companies, studios, and schools, to drive sales and brand awareness
* Actively engage in market development, identifying new opportunities and trends to drive business
* Supporting account management in a multi-channel sales environment
* Providing accurate sales forecasts and contributing to strategic planning



**Requirements** 



* At least two years of experience in relevant sales roles (experience in video cinematography or photography is a plus)
* A strong business mindset and proven ability to achieve sales results
* Native-level German and fluent English (Dutch is a plus)
* Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and communication skills
* Willingness to travel extensively in DACH Germany
* Adaptability and a proactive approach to working in a fast-paced environment



**Profile** 



* Highly motivated, results-oriented, and driven to succeed
* Business-minded with a focus on achieving measurable goals
* Skilled at building and maintaining strong relationships with partners and dealers
* Creative and strategic thinker with a hands-on approach to problem-solving
* Team player comfortable working in an international business environment



**Want to join Profoto – The Light Shaping Company** 
 ?
   

 If you feel you have what it takes to become our new Sales Representative DACH, please apply with your CV or LinkedIn profile. If you move forward to the next step, you will be invited to complete our ability assessments as part of the process. Please attach you University Diploma.
 



 Interviews will take place continuously, so please apply today!
 



**About us**
 Profoto is more than a brand; Profoto is more than the world-leading light-shaping products we make. Profoto is dedicated to making every image the best it can be by helping the creator bring the very best quality of light to the image. And when you consider there are billions of images taken every single day, you start to truly understand the full extent of our commitment to light-shaping excellence. That dedication and passion have been a part of our DNA from the beginning.
 



**What we offer**
 Innovation has secured our position as the leading choice for the world’s best photographers. So, our culture is creative, entrepreneurial, forward-thinking and agile. That’s why we’re looking for the best and brightest to help make us better. Talented and driven people who are keen to enter a growing and fast-paced environment where responsibility is given early.
 



 As a result, we’ve created a company where high achievers will be given every opportunity to grow, develop, and contribute on an international stage. That’s massively important for us because ultimately – your success is our success.

title: Inside Sales - Bli en Nyckelspelare i Vårt Säljteam! (On site)
description:
Inside Sales - Bli en Nyckelspelare i Vårt Säljteam!
   

  

**Ansvarsområden:**
* Hantera Befintliga Kunder: Bygg och underhåll starka relationer med våra nuvarande kunder för att säkerställa deras nöjdhet och lojalitet. Ditt fokus kommer att vara att förstå deras behov och proaktivt erbjuda lösningar.
* Engagera och vårda leads: Du kommer att spela en central roll i att identifiera och kvalificera potentiella kunder genom kreativ och analytisk research via telefon, e-post och sociala medier. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla och implementera strategier för att engagera och vårda leads, med fokus på att attrahera och inspirera intresse för våra produkter och tjänster. Din förmåga att kommunicera effektivt och skapa intresse är avgörande för att lyckas i denna roll.
* Säljsupport: Du kommer att vara en viktig länk mellan våra kunder och våra erbjudanden. Detta genom att bland annat förbereda offerter och hantera avtal, och licenshantering. Din noggrannhet och organisatoriska förmåga kommer att vara ovärderlig.
* Rapportering och Analys: Följ upp kampanjresultat och dela insikter med ledningen för att ständigt förbättra våra processer och strategier.


 Är du en hungrig och ambitiös person som vill ta din karriär till nästa nivå? COSMO söker nu en
 **Inside Sales** 
 -representant som är redo att göra skillnad! I denna spännande roll kommer du att vara en central del av vårt säljteam och bidra till vår framgång genom att:
   

  

**Ansvarsområden:**
* Hantera Befintliga Kunder: Bygg och underhåll starka relationer med våra nuvarande kunder för att säkerställa deras nöjdhet och lojalitet. Ditt fokus kommer att vara att förstå deras behov och proaktivt erbjuda lösningar.
* Engagera och vårda leads: Du kommer att spela en central roll i att identifiera och kvalificera potentiella kunder genom kreativ och analytisk research via telefon, e-post och sociala medier. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla och implementera strategier för att engagera och vårda leads, med fokus på att attrahera och inspirera intresse för våra produkter och tjänster. Din förmåga att kommunicera effektivt och skapa intresse är avgörande för att lyckas i denna roll.
* Säljsupport: Du kommer att vara en viktig länk mellan våra kunder och våra erbjudanden. Detta genom att bland annat förbereda offerter och hantera avtal, och licenshantering. Din noggrannhet och organisatoriska förmåga kommer att vara ovärderlig.
* Rapportering och Analys: Följ upp kampanjresultat och dela insikter med ledningen för att ständigt förbättra våra processer och strategier.


**Kvalifikationer:**
* Utbildning: Universitet eller yrkeskvalificerad utbildning inom finans, marknadsföring eller IT.
* Erfarenhet: Några års erfarenhet inom försäljning. Du har en bevisad förmåga att nå och överträffa försäljningsmål. Har du erfarenhet av att ha arbetet med Affärssystem eller CRM-system är detta meriterande.
* Språk: Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
* Personliga Egenskaper: Du är social, energisk och har en förmåga att skapa relationer med kunder. Du trivs i en dynamisk miljö och är inte rädd för att ta initiativ. Vi söker en "alltiallo"-person som är driven och redo att ta ansvar för vår go-to-market strategi.


**Varför COSMO?**
 Bli en del av COSMO och hjälp oss att driva vår expansion och go-to-market strategi framåt! Här får du möjlighet att växa och utvecklas i en stimulerande och stödjande miljö. Det är att föredra om du bor på någon av oreterna Göteborg eller Malmö. Vi värdesätter innovation och initiativ, och vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team!**
 Vi är också unika.
   

  

 Det är det som skiljer oss åt:
   

  

* Hos oss är alla en del av teamet - din röst behövs, även när det gäller vår egen företagsutveckling.
* Det är viktigt för oss att du känner dig uppskattad och stödd.
* Platsoberoende och flexibelt arbete är en självklarhet för oss. I rollen ingår det att kontinuerligt besöka något av våra kontor runt om i Sverige; Stockholm, Malmö och Göteborg.
* Internationellt samarbete är vardag för oss - upptäck andra kulturer och nya världar.
* En säker och positiv arbetsmiljö är vår högsta prioritet.
* Vi har omvandling i blodet - vi står inte stilla.
* Det ligger oss varmt om hjärtat att tillsammans med dig utforma din fortsatta utveckling.
* Hos oss är det möjligt att göra olika och ovanliga karriärer.
* Vi tar vårt ansvar för människor och miljö på allvar.


 Do you want to become part of the team?
   

  

 Apply directly online with your informative application documents and your earliest possible start date.
   

  

 Do you want more #insideCOSMO?

title: Sales Associate (f/m/d) - Part time
description:
***This job is with Patagonia, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
 Patagonia is an outdoor apparel company founded in 1973. At a time when all life on earth is under threat of extinction, we aim to use the resources we have-our business, our investments, our voice and our imagination-to influence changes needed to protect our planet. A registered B Corporation and founding member of 1% for the Planet, Patagonia is recognised internationally for its commitment to product quality and environmental activism, contributing over $145 million in grants and in-kind donations to thousands of grassroots environmental groups around the world.
   

  

**Your Role**
 We are in business to save our home planet. You'll be helping us achieve this by creating an amazing experience for our customers and making a positive impact in the community, using the store as a vehicle for change and acting as a brand advocate inside and outside of the store. Our stores support local environmental groups with donations, volunteers, advocacy, and events that provide a platform to share and engage in activism and you will be a part of it.
   

  

**Main Tasks**
* Welcome, assist, and engage customers by providing a positive experience for everyone who comes in-ensuring that the customer's needs are understood and met.
* Determine and meet the specific needs of each customer with kindness and creativity, making sure every person is treated with equal respect and professionalism.
* Share your knowledge of core sports and products and your passion for the environment to provide support to grassroots environmental groups and create engagement with our customers.
* Contribute to a team that is responsible for the store's success through customer service, merchandising, operations, events, and environmental activism.
* Perform daily store operations: checking and replenishing stock whenever necessary, operating the cash register, as well as opening and closing it, merchandise the store during downtimes (folding, hanging, steaming and stocking), etc.


**What We're Looking For**
* A love of the outdoors.
* A passion for saving our home planet and making a positive impact through your work.
* A colleague with demonstrated service experience, who thrives in a team-based atmosphere.
* Enthusiasm and interest in learning about our products, values and history. Passion about the environment and caring for others.
* A colleague who deals well with ambiguity, learns on the fly, demonstrates sound judgment, and solves problems creatively.
* Accuracy with money handling and register use
* Language skills: fluent in Swedish and English.


**It's a Plus If You Also Are/have The Following**
* Experience working in the retail and/or outdoor industry.
* If you participate in and appreciate our core sports (climbing, skiing, snowboarding, surfing, fly fishing, mountain biking, trail running) it will be a plus.


**Other Important Details**
* This is a part time-position.
* This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.


**Why join our store?**
 Our stores are designed to be hubs for our communities, where we inspire, educate and engage with environmental and social defenders and those who love wild places and outdoor sports. For example, we support local groups with grants, donations, volunteers, advocacy, and events.
   

  

 You will join a passionate team working to protect the wild places around us and changing the retail industry for the better, whilst having fun together.
   

  

 At Patagonia, we commit to becoming an anti-racist company that leads by example. This means doing the work to be inclusive and equitable, across all aspects of our business.
   

  

 Every person who applies to join Patagonia receives equal employment opportunities, and we value a welcoming environment where each member of our EMEA team feels included, respected and empowered, regardless of their race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, civil status, national origin, disability or age.
   

  

 At Patagonia, we strive to have inclusive representation within our organization and embrace a diverse mix of talent to contribute to our culture. We actively seek applications from Black and People of Color (BPOC) and other underrepresented groups.
   

  

 As we are in business to save our home planet, we can only do this together.
   

  

**Please make sure that your CV and cover letter are in English.**
**Disclaimer For Recruitment Agencies**
 Thanks for your interest in supporting us for this role, but we don't accept unsolicited CVs from recruitment agencies
   

  

 #entrylevel

title: Product Marketing Specialist (flexible location)
description:
At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions.
   

  

 That's our story. Make it your story.
   

  

 This position reports to
   

  

 Head of Application Management, MOIM
   

  

 Your role and responsibilities
   

  

 s a valuable member of our product marketing department, you'll play a crucial role in planning and executing captivating marketing campaigns and materials. Your contributions will be felt worldwide as you collaborate closely with communication, sales, and product management teams in a truly global environment. You will drive and implement product marketing activities for the assigned product(s) in line with the agreed plan, including defining and communicating product value propositions and product positioning in accordance with the global product marketing strategy.
   

  

 The work model for the role is: hybrid ;
   

  

 The role is contributing to the Motion / IEC LV Motors globally.
   

  

 You will be mainly accountable for:
   

  

* Creative and Digital Marketing: Ideating and crafting compelling marketing materials, leading website design and updates, utilizing expertise in content management systems and Adobe tools, as well as collaborating with experienced professionals to foster skills and career growth.
* Strategic Marketing and Implementation: Collaborating with management to define and implement strategic marketing plans, supporting business units, and executing annual marketing plans in collaboration with relevant divisions or product groups.
* Market Analysis and Trend Monitoring: Collecting and analyzing market and competitor data, monitoring market trends, and recommending improvements to marketing strategies to meet changing landscapes.
* Product Marketing and Support: Implementing product marketing strategies, defining and communicating product value propositions, supporting sales teams with relevant materials and guidance, as well as promoting segment, product, and tool knowledge.


**Qualifications For The Role**
* -2 years of experience with product marketing activities
* University degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Communications or related field.
* Experience of creating presentations or other marketing materials is a must have.
* Knowledge or experience in website content management systems and Adobe tools (e.g. InDesign, Photoshop) or Power BI is a definite plus.
* Passion for building strong relationships and working in a collaborative team setting.
* Ability to communicate with a wide range of different stakeholders across all levels.
* Self-driven and proactive working methods with can do attitude.
* Customer-oriented mindset, always striving to deliver the best possible experience to our clients.
* Fluent English language skills.


 More about us
   

  

 The IEC Low Voltage Division is a technology leader delivering a full range of energy-efficient low voltage motors, including ultra-efficient solutions such as IE5 SynRM (synchronous reluctance motors). Through a global footprint, domain expertise and rugged designs, the Division provides reliable technology that improves efficiency and productivity even in the most demanding applications.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #MyABBStory
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application (documents submitted in English are appreciated). If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com.
   

  

  

**94913623**

title: Senior Software Architect - Native Apps
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 You will work with the native apps team within the larger product organization, to focus on developing and maintaining innovative and high performing mobile applications, keep us at the forefront of mobile gaming, and ultimately help us reach our passion of creating “The greatest iGaming experience”.
   

  

 The Native Apps Domain Architect is a senior architect role where you will be driving the native apps architectural strategy and ensuring it aligns with the business requirements. You will be a part of an architectural group and collaborate with other architects and senior developers in a cross collaborative environment. We do expect you to write code where needed to guide the developers in the team, and to ensure that our mobile applications meet business requirements, are performant and engaging for our customers.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Focus on the mobile apps for LeoVegas brands such as BetMGM, LeoVegas, BetUK and Expekt
* Contribute to launching new brands and brand expansions into new territories
* Long term vision of the mobile apps with a focus on product and user experience
* Ensuring that the mobile apps maintains an overall technical architecture that is robust, scalable and efficient
* Guide the development of high quality React native applications for both iOS and Android platforms
* We see that you have experience in leading other engineers and the ability to understand the overall picture. Communicating complex technical challenges for non-technical stakeholders.
* Represent your domain in technical discussions and solution designs with architect peers and stakeholders
* Educating developers in best practices and architecture principles
* Reviewing developers work and provide relevant feedback


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* Minimum of 4 years of working as an architect
* Minimum of 3 years of working as a mobile app developer
* Experience in mentoring other developers
* Good knowledge and understanding of iOS or android development
* Good understanding of architectural principles in scalable, highly concurrent, and fault-tolerant enterprise systems
* Clear Communication - being able to adapt depending on who you have in front of you


 NICE TO HAVES
   

  

* Experience with React Native
* Knowledge of GraphQL
* Experience with Typescript


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: Postdoctoral studies in Virology and Cell Biology (scholarship)
description:
**Do you want to contribute to top quality medical research?**
 The Department of Microbiology, Tumor and Cell Biology (MTC) at Karolinska Institutet conducts research and teaching within immunology, infection biology, cell biology and cancer. MTC has about 40 research groups and our key words are multidisciplinary, bridging, national and international collaborations.
   

  

**Division**
 The Division of Virology and Immunology at MTC comprises ten research groups working on aspects of molecular virology, viral immunity, T- and B-cell biology and vaccine responses to complex antigens. We share a well-equipped laboratory space in the Biomedicum building with access to state-of-the-art microscopy, flow cytometry and protein science facilities and to a well-equipped BSL3 laboratory.
   

  

 A postdoctoral position is available in Prof Gerald McInerney’s research group. The laboratory focuses on the cell biology of virus infection, with a particular interest in alphaviruses, including chikungunya virus. We have a wide network of collaboration partners in virology, immunology, vaccinology, structural biology and biophysics, computational biology, and other fields of interest. Some recent publications from the group: Götte et al., PLoS Pathogens 2019; Hanke et al., Nature Comms 2020 and 2022; Long et al., Nature Comms 2024. Further information can be found at our website www.alphavirus.org.
   

  

**Duties**
 The successful candidate will employ proteomics-based methods to uncover novel interaction partners in alphavirus infections and in infection-related cellular conditions. Screening methods, using CRISPR and RNAi as well as drug libraries will be used to identify novel cellular players in viral infection. In addition, hypothesis-driven investigations should reveal mechanisms of importance in viral infection and host responses.
   

  

 The postdoctoral fellow will have or will develop expertise with classical virology and cell biology methods as well as to contribute to the development of new techniques and methods to study cell biology of viral infection. The work will be presented in prominent academic journals and at international conferences. The successful candidate will contribute to the day-to-day supervision and training of project students and junior staff.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 A creative and inspiring environment with wide-ranging expertise and interests. Karolinska Institutet is one of the world's leading medical universities. Here, we conduct innovative medical research and provide the largest range of biomedical education in Sweden. At KI, you get to meet researchers working with a wide range of specialisms and methods, giving you ample opportunity to exchange knowledge and experience with the various scientific fields within medicine and health. It is the crossover collaborations, which have pushed KI to where it is today, at the forefront of global research. Several of the people you meet in healthcare are educated at KI. A close relationship with the health care providers is important for creating groundbreaking top quality education and research. Students and employees have free access to our modern gym facilities with trained staff on site.
   

  

**Entry Requirements**
 Postdoctoral scholarships may be established for foreign researchers who pursue their postdoctoral research in Sweden. The purpose of scholarships for postdoctoral qualification is to promote internationalization and contribute to research qualification after a doctorate or equivalent.
   

  

 A scholarship for carrying out postdoctoral research can be granted for a maximum of two years within a four year period following the receipt of a doctoral degree or equivalent.
   

  

 To be eligible for a postdoctoral scholarship, the person must have obtained a doctorate or a foreign degree deemed to be equivalent to a doctorate. Applicants who have not completed a doctorate at the end of the application period may also apply, provided that all requirements for a completed degree are met before the (intended) start date of the post doctoral education.
   

  

 The head of the department determines whether their previous training and scholarly qualifications correspond to a Swedish doctorate or higher.
   

  

***In addition to the above requirements for the position:***
* Have or will soon obtain a PhD or equivalent degree in virology, cell biology or another relevant field
* Interest in laboratory supervision of MSc and PhD students as well as formal undergraduate teaching activities
* Good interpersonal skills and ability to work in teams
* Good communication skills in spoken and written English
* Ability to work creatively and independently


***Meritorious for the position:***
* Experience with use of a variety of -omics methodologies to study virology and/or cell biology and skills in interpreting large datasets from such techniques
* A track record of publications in high quality peer-reviewed academic journals


**Location:** 
 Solna
   

  

 https://ki.se/en/research/research-areas-centres-and-networks/research-groups/regulation-of-gene-expression-during-viral-infection-gerald-mcinerney-group
   

  

**Type of scholarship**
 The amount is tax free and it is set for twelve months at a time, paid out on a six months basis. In exceptional cases, shorter periods may be acceptable.
   

  

**Application process**
***An* 
*application* 
*must* 
*contain* 
*the* 
*following* 
*documents* 
*in* 
*English* 
*or* 
*Swedish:***
* A complete curriculum vitae, including date of the thesis defence, title of the thesis, previous academic positions, academic title, current position, academic distinctions, and committee work
* A complete list of publications
* A summary of current work (no more than one page)
* Names and contact details of at least two academic referees


 The application is to be submitted on the Varbi recruitment system.
   

  

**Want to make a difference? Join us and contribute to better health for all**
